41.title: Unconditional Healing
41.print_description: Tired of searching for a cure for your grief. Let go this notion and.develop a proper psychological state of mind and begin to heal.
41.desc:
Tired of searching for a cure for your grief. Let go this notion and.develop a proper psychological state of mind and begin to heal.

This approach to healing is based on the Eastern philosophy of synchronizing the body and the mind. Once we do that we can begin to truly heal from any emotional or physical issues we're dealing with. I've practiced a technique called a body scan which helps join body and mind. I'm curious to see how this would work in a group setting as this would be a new experience for me. After the body scan, I plan to start by asking everyone what they want to heal from and from there perhaps develop a common theme among the participants or just see what comes up and go with the energy in the dome.

45.title: Longevity Stick
45.print_description: Sun’s up, not too hot, but clothes R optional. It’s a low-impact exercise to add balance, open points, channels. Bring H2O. We’ll provide the sticks!
45.desc: The sun’s just up, but not too hot; clothing is optional here, so adults only, please. Come for a not too early hour of low-impact exercise in the Longevity Stick Art (LSA) discipline of 12 low-impact exercises to build balance, flexibility, strength, mental focus, breathing capacity, and vitality, and open your points and channels. Bring your water or hydration liquid. We’ll provide sticks for you. Master Mai Bac Dao developed Longevity Stick Art discipline while he was a prisoner of war of the North Vietnamese. He helped his fellow prisoners restore and maintain health through LSA, and vowed if he was ever freed, he’d dedicate his life to spread its benefits, with the proviso that no trainer could ever charge for it. (Like "gifting," eh?) He was freed, moved to Southern California, and taught classes of students and future teachers. Today, weekly classes abound in So Cal, around the US, and the world. See: www.longevitystick.org/Longevitystick.org/Home.html and www.filmbaby.com/films/2341 .

67.title: Exploring Conscious Touch
67.print_description: Practice energetic and physical touch with guidance including Elemental Massage
67.desc:
"We are all yearning for greater connection, yet often find ourselves lacking a place where we may explore while having our boundaries honored in each moment.
 
 Come co-create this special evening where we will be invited to find our ease in connection.
 
 Touch is a place where we as humans are often feeling a lack, but have an edge around asking for what we may desire or need. 
 
 Let us create a container where all may be witnessed in their desire. A container where guilt, shame and fear around giving and receiving touch may be stripped away. Where we simply interact with consciousness and choice and that each honoring of another further honors ourselves.
 
 We will begin with a simple ceremony of seeing and being seen, so that we may drop into presence with one another. 
 
 From there we will co-create our agreements and boundaries for the evening. Then we will engage in some guided massage, so that no one needs worry about skill or technique. We can all learn and explore together.
 
 Elemental massage is a beautiful way to welcome our bodies and explore differing kinds of activating and sensation touch.
 
 Know that you may choose to participate with a particular partner. All boundaries around partnership, touch and clothing will be honored. 
 
 This is an evening of self-exploration, opening to our natural touch-positive nature in a way which is intended to open more pathways to self-love."

68.desc: Don’t be a Boar all by yourself, come play with the Pigs! We’ve been hosting our famous daytime party on the Playa for well over a decade. Our fabulous bartenders hog-craft each and every Bloody Mary we make with over 10 different ingredients. Sizzling strips of pork are hoof-served to the squealing swine wallowing on our shaded sofas.  All vegetarians are welcomed (to be converted) at our event. Get your trotters tapping with DJ Julio playing some of the best (and obscure) disco you’ll ever hear. 75.desc: Want to color up? Come by our colorful RV, brush and finger paint up any and every part of your and your friends bodies with body and MOOP safe paint. We humans come in so many flavors, with such awesome variety! Join us as we decorate our bodies and visually proclaim who we are. With just a few splashes (daubs) of colorful paint, our living canvases become incredible expressions of our unique version of “human”, our personal “performance art.” Its a delight for the senses - especially touch - feeling brush or finger strokes over your skin can be a very sensual experience. We will offer printed photo postcards to send a picture of your body art home to your friends, family or yourself as a fun memory.

With your help by the end of the week we'll have an army of mutated cyborg flamingos gathered in the lagoon ready to be blasted back to the past to invade Florence.

How can we create happier, healthier, more sustainable human developments, facilitating an evolution of consciousness through innovating and architecting the future through our homes?

Sustainable, tribal micro-communities are the future of this planet: come to hear experts discuss intentional community formation - what works, what doesn't, best practices, and how we can evolve consciousness through innovative tribal architecture."

127.title: Porn & Donuts
127.print_description: What's better than a deliciously decadent donut? How about a side of hot porn? We're serving hot hand crafted donuts fresh off the fryers by midnight.
127.desc:
What's better than a deliciously decadent donut? How about a side of hot porn? Movies start screening at about 10pm. Hot hand crafted donuts are fresh off the fryers by midnight. 

Porn and Donuts was started in 2011. Our mission at PND is to serve deliciously decadent doughnut delights to as many dusty hungry burners as we possibly can. We screen top-notch vintage (silent era) pornography in our outdoor movie theater while serving hot, fresh, on playa made donuts.

Last year we served approximately 3,000 freshly donuts prepared on playa (300 pounds of dry donut mix). We even managed to convert one or two vegetarians along the way.

136.desc: Sex on the playa? No, it’s not a rumor, it can happen. Learn about sexual experiences, sexual identities and sexual communities at Black Rock City with Hunter, a social psychologist studying sexuality at BRC with the Census Lab since 2012. Discover the predictors of sexual risk at BRC. Ask your questions about sex research at the Census Lab. And do all that while mingling with fellow Burning Nerds and sipping mixed drinks.

Our chill cuddle dome vibe will lift your senses with delicious cocktails, sweet tropical house music, lots of cuddles, and a nice cooling off underneath the misting system,  just to make you feel right back on the beach! FIRST 15 GUESTS WILL RECEIVE A FREE PAIR OF SWEET SHADES SPECIALLY MADE WITH LOVE FROM OUR CUDDLE OASIS TEAM!

139.title: UNTITLED # 6
139.print_description: Untitled # 6 is a quadraphonic, interactive audio installation. Are you the one changing the sound with your movement? Step inside and see.
139.desc: Untitled # 6 is a Quadrophonic, interactive audio installation that engages the community on four different levels: sight, sound, intellect and instinct, transforming the traditional, and often times, stagnant connection between art and spectator into an improvised relationship among of a collaborative group. It is this engagement that explores the process of making art. It envelops the spectator, forcing them to experience art on a level beyond contemplation, a level besieged by inspiration and driven by immediacy.? Step inside and see.

140.desc: Just like light, sound, or ocean waves, a dancing body moving freely passes through five distinct rhythmic patterns. These patterns continuously repeat themselves in a wave of motion. Gabrielle Roth's 5Rhythms® are: FLOWING – the fluid, continuous, grounded glide of our own movements; STACCATO – the percussive, pulsing beat that shapes us a thousand different ways; CHAOS – the rhythm of letting go, releasing into the catalytic wildness of our dance that can never be planned or repeated; LYRICAL – the rhythm of trance, where the weight of self-consciousness dissolves, where we lighten up and disappear into our own uniqueness; and STILLNESS – the quiet emptiness, where gentle movements rise and fall, start and end, in a field of silence. Please join Aaron Lifshin for an introduction to the 5Rhythms movement practice, at RhythmWave.
140.title: What are those 5Rhythms anyway? w/Aaron Lifshin
140.print_description: Please join Aaron Lifshin for an introduction to the 5Rhythms movement practice, at RhythmWave.

141.title: The Impossible Breakfast
141.print_description: "Experts" think it's physically impossible to make breakfast using your butt cheeks to crack eggs, we beg to differ.  Let's get cracking!
141.desc:
At Roko's Basilica we like to question the impossible and this one topic has torn our community for too long. "Experts" think it's physically impossible to crack an egg with ones butt cheeks. We are tired of listening to experts!  Here at Roko's Basilica we achieve the impossible. 

Come one, come all for the breakfast showdown of a lifetime. We will prove to the world that not only is it possible to crack an egg with one's butt but we will host a competition for who can crack the most eggs and make breakfast out of them!  Whoever can successfully crack an egg will get the victory breakfast with nothing less than your accomplishment for all to envy in glory. 

Anyone and everyone is encouraged to join in this historic, scientific and breakfast related breakthrough. Eggs will be provided, let's get cracking!

We'll show you how and you'll leave with a crystal of your own, supplies permitting. Mon-Fri 2-3pm  Dark Wednesday.

188.desc:
"Learn to give and receive Thai Yoga bodywork, in which compassionate intention, energetic connection, and deep physical (but nonsexual) intimacy converge to produce a profound state of relaxation, rejuvenation and well-being. Bring a partner or find one there!
 
 Rhythmic movement and deep pressure help stimulate the body's own healing processes. The receiver remains clothed; no oils are used. 
 
 One partner receives while the other gives; halfway through the workshop we switch so that each gets a turn.
 
 We focus on the essential core elements of safe and effective bodywork: Intention, Connection, Safety, and Self-care. The Thai yoga bodywork sequence used is a slow-moving, simplified yet effective sequence. Poses can be modified as needed to accommodate individual differences. No prior yoga or bodywork experience needed!"

209.title: The Temple — Convertere [clothing optional]
209.print_description: Engage in play that explores the unsaid. Go to where you can’t go alone. Reveal. Listen. Question. Vent. Return to yourself through each other.
209.desc:
<< The Temple >>

We are each a temple [literally "place cut off," from stem of “tem” — to cut].  Inside each temple are housed experiences that are the basis of how we comprehend ourselves.  The temple that we are is an adventure.  In that adventure we are swimming through contradictions, polarity, wonder, desires, embarrassments; our emotions, feelings, curiosities, wounds, traumas.

In the temple, what develops is the movement of the psyche. Maibel and Anthony serve as psychopomp guides through the temple with different exercises, taking participants on a trip that expands comprehension of their human complexity, our connection to each other, the need to explore the conversations that we never had. 
　
　
<< The Temple — Convertere >>

You’ll engage in play that explores the unsaid. Go to where you can’t go alone. Reveal. Listen. Question. Vent. Return to yourself through each other.  Convertere means converter, deriving from “turn around, transform, come-together, to turn, to return.”  C/O*
　
　
<< Your psychopomps >>

Maibel was born in Caracas, Venezuela, and while residing in Buenos Aires, Argentina, she developed an acting process through the use of group research and play creation experience. She’s a permanent member of the Unknown Theater Group in Buenos Aires, which for 40 years has been a proponent of the Unknown Experience art form. 

Anthony organizes naturist and intimacy-building events in NYC and South Florida.  His mentors include Christina Berkley, Guy Sengstock, John Thompson, Sean Wilkinson, Sara Ness, Amy Silverman, Jordan Myska Allen, Gina Brezini, and Nicole Daedone.

We moderate a Facebook group called The Temple exploring the unknown, the unheard, the unsaid — and union. And another called Colony where we encourage conscious, smart, and progressive social nudism and sexuality.  

　
*Clothing optional.  Nudity is not a requirement.

As a Mexican I just get giddy happy when I see my fellow Burners with colorful sombreros throughout Playa.... it simply evokes the festive nature of my culture: fiesta, spirits, baile, canto and some good food! I want to take it a step further and challenge 'cultural appropriation' stigmas out there by making it a WIN-WIN situation here: If you wear a Sombrero on Playa, you gotta KiSS A MEXiCAN! Come celebrate in the BiGGEST GATHERiNG OF BURNERS with SOMBREROS at Center Camp Cafe. Bring your SOMBREROS, your TEQUILA, and your AMiGOS... and together we'll go in search of MEXiCANS ON PLAYA and share the LOVE!!! This year I am also gonna do something that IT'S SO OUT OF MY LEAGUE and make a ViDEO!!! SO come be part of the GIFT the GiVES and immortalize yourselves (and your SOMBRERO) in a funky video I got prepared for ya!! Arriba Arriba!! Come to Center Camp cafe and locate each other by, you got it, wearing a SOMBRERO!!! )'(

218.desc: 5Rhythms with Eugene Hedlund is an in-bodied, out of your mind dance experience not to be missed! It’s a simple yet powerful moving meditation that anyone – of any age, size, or physical ability – can practice. There are no steps to follow, no choreography to learn, no way to do it wrong. The only requirements are a body that is still breathing, a mind that is still curious, and a heart that is still beating. All are invited to join Eugene on the bamboo at RhythmWave, as we flow through our 10th consecutive year in Black Rock City!

219.title: Orgasmic Meditation for Women - What, Why & How
219.print_description: Orgasmic Meditation is a partnered practice & we will be only women and transfolks.  Each woman can experience stroking & getting stroked!
219.desc: OM (orgasmic meditation) is a sequenced practice in which one partner gently strokes the other partner’s clitoris for 15 minutes. The result is said to be therapeutic, rather than sexual. The “stroking” activates the limbic system and releases a flood of oxytocin. The technique was originally billed as a spiritual-style practice like meditation, but as it gains popularity, it’s being presented as more of a “technological innovation” or “body-hack to happiness.” The “guru” of the technique, 46-year-old Nicole Daedone, guarantees that it’s profound whether you’re coupled or single.   This course will be strictly women and transfolks so that everyone can experience the electricity on both sides of the position.

220.desc:
We invite all of Black Rock City to join us in our march from the French Quarter to the ashes of the Man, and back. A smaller procession will continue on to the Temple with remembrances. The mood is joyous, humorous, melancholy, sultry, and respectful, all at once. It is a time in which we honor the dead by living life to the fullest.

Before the parade, there will be an impromptu brunch in the French Quarter, and everyone is encouraged to bring whatever they would like to cook or share. Musicians are all welcome to join the main line. Mutant vehicles and other participants are all welcome to join the second line. If you are not bringing an instrument, feel free to bring libations or hydration to support the march.

Give yourself permission to go without a tampon or pad for once. Wear white pants with no underwear. Embrace freedom! Let the blood make its artistic mark! Today is the day to feel like a natural Womyn!!!

BYO Blanket, BYO Wine, BYO Cheese, BYO Dessert, BYO date or friend…we provide the music and stage.  Reverbia's location on the Esplanade affords beautiful views of art and desert mountains…in a neighborhood where live music is respected by all thumping DJs…a place where you can actually hear the delicate of string and woodwind. This could be your chance to rekindle relationships, court a Burner for a first date, or just connect with good friends and family…perhaps even a sunset of self appreciation and silence...except for the music of Mozart and Debussy.  Enjoy your best wine…and maybe some light dinner along with that nice slice of Cheesecake you have been saving in the RV.  Manet's "Dejeuner sur l'Herbe"...BRC Sunset style! 239.title: Quantum Sound & Sacred Scalar Energy MEDITATION
239.print_description: Uproot limiting subconscious thought patterns, shed pounds of emotional baggage and ignite your connection to Source through an experiential journey!
239.desc:
TONE YOUR SOUL offers…
Quantum Sound & Sacred Scalar Energy GROUP MEDITATION
 
Uproot unproductive subconscious thought patterns, shed pounds of emotional baggage and re-ignite your connection to Source!

Stand in your strength and actualize your greatest life!
 
In this experiential journey facilitated by Sharon & Lothlorien, you will participate in a group meditation using Quantum Sound Technologies as a method of Energetic Stress Release.

As well, the VAS (Voice Analysis System) Technology analyzes the groups voice sample, and then creates custom frequencies that the group then listens to. What’s in YOUR Voice is in YOUR Life
 
The leading premise of the VAS technology is that every human voice has a unique frequency that is measurable. These tones will balance and harmonize the group energy and facilitate personal shifts on many levels.
 
Please bring yoga mat/towel and pillow and get comfortable.

Sharon is a licensed Spiritual Health Coach and grateful for the opportunity to share these amazing tools for change.

240.desc: The Bucky Ball pit is inspired by the life and work of Buckminster Fuller, a Da Vince of the 20th century. Come have a ball and gain a deeper understanding of the fundamentals behind creating a future that “works for 100% of humanity, in the shortest possible time through spontaneous cooperation, without ecological offense or the disadvantage of anyone”. Immersive yourself in virtual reality and connect the dots/balls between your intuitive ideas around ecological/conscious design and the core principles of nature’s coordinate system. Play with and create your own models of synergetic structures. Learn how geodesic domes are made.
240.title: Bucky Ball Pit with VR: Fuller's Workbench
240.print_description: Explore nature's coordinate system and the work of Bucky Fuller, a DaVinci of the 20th century, in a ball pit and virtual reality experience.

246.desc:
Liminal Labs Workshop is fustian to announce a breakthrough advance in the art of Camera Obscura. Utilizing our Movie Mirror Obscura technology, what wast once restricted to the dark isolation of a head-sized box or a stuffy, lightless chamber, is anon a shared, open-air experience under the stars themselves. Thrill to see actual, illuminate images of people, places, and things (things!!!) that seem to move with a divine direction of their own making.

Leonardo daVinci was himself taken with the possibilities of the Camera Obscura. Inspired, Liminal Labs Workshop does the Master one better by adding focused, intense illumination on a 53-foot white wall to offer an experience beyond what even Leonardo might imagine.

Indeed, the Movie Mirror Obscura dual screen system shines brighter than the heavens and is blended with sounds to tempt the dancing angels. From Tuesda through Friday, each evening’s dark of night brings, not one, but two images magically mirrored, side-by-side for thy Royal amusement. Prithee shaketh thy booty if so moved. Or sit and enjoy the movie magic.

257.desc: The Monks of Funk draw our inspiration from dance and music. For us, it's a form of personal exploration, expression and reflection. Its our way of connecting to others.  It can be cathartic and source of joy. We're as serious as we can be about something that makes us positively silly; dance and play is our form of worship. To that end, when we dance, we really mean it. Our Wednesday Night Worship is our annual on Playa dance party that brings friends new and old from across the Playa to 'worship' with us in the Dance Church.

271.title: Yoga Mala: 108 Sun Salutations
271.print_description: Come practice a yoga mala: 108 meditative and devotional sun salutations performed at sunrise on the day the Man burns. Scaled to all bodies!
271.desc: One to the first power, times two to the second, times three to the third: That's 108, the number of beads on a Buddhist prayer string and the number of sun salutations in this devotional, meditative, and spiritual yoga practice. Come join us at the Man on the day he burns, facing the rising sun on the deep playa side, for some joyful time spent moving our bodies and breathing together. No need to be scared by the number 108! The point is to breathe and to be, and the practice will be scaled to everybody and all bodies, including those that have never done yoga before! Join us to honor a beautiful community and to welcome a beautiful new year. Everybody welcome.
271.other_location: Just past the Man, towards the rising sun

273.title: Realtime authentic relating games
273.print_description: Let's shed judgements and assumptions, and reveal our true selves through connection games!
273.desc:
In this workshop we are going to play a few authentic relating games that center on connection. We stay in the present moment, report on our current experiences, and do our best to stay objective about the observations we make.
 
 For instance, if we want to only say things that are so objective that a camera could pick up on them, we might say "I notice your eyes are squinting and I see you are smiling" instead of "I see that you are happy".
 
 Because we don't know if that person is happy for sure, they could be putting on a face because they are nervous and afraid!

274.desc:
Bicycle repair -- full service and do-it-yourself.
And while the bike is being serviced; we offer foot washing, Reiki, massage, hypno-therapy, body painting, and perhaps other services for the bike's owner.
Please note full name of camp:  Elliot's Naked Bicycle Service & Piano Bar.
Yes, some of us work in the nude.  And nude customers go to the front of the line.  (Family friendly nudity, please.  We are NOT an "adult" camp.)

279.title: Harvesting carbon and storing it in hemp buildings
279.print_description: Harvesting carbon and storing it in hemp buildings - communities leading change: Klara Marosszeky
279.desc: Leonardo knew about many of the uses of hemp ...  It's a soil remediator and one of the fastest growing, most useful biomass crops for manufacturing that you can farm.  Industrial hemp fibre crops harvest high volumes of carbon very quickly, so farming and building hemp housing is a very effective way to store carbon - each build locks up tonnes of it. The buildings are also thermally effective so you have reduced operational energy costs. The broad opportunities for value adding to fibre crops mean that wherever communities work together with farmers, they can potentially create major positive change.

320.desc:
Come sit in our comfy chairs and relax for the best foot wash you've ever been given.  We supply everything needed. Bring your dusty feet and smile.

For the fourth year in a row Healing Foot Wash is coming again to Burning Man!  Find us on Rod's Road and take a load off your feet for a few minutes.  We follow a simple 4 step process:
1) Diluted vinegar to neutralize the alkaline dusty pH
2) Diluted Dr. Bronner's soap to release the dust
3) Pure water rinse
4) Dry feet and apply foot lotion

Sit and enjoy the attention in our open shade structure and chat for a while.  We're totally family friendly and welcome participation in foot washing.

Our 1 rule:
You can only wash feet after you've had your feet washed.

Come by and say hi! :)

330.desc:
"There a million choices on the playa (and in life). Learn how to never fear you're making the wrong choice because you know how to navigate your path by trusting what feels right in your body.
 
 Qoya is based on the idea that through movement we remember. We remember our essence is wise, wild and free. Wise, wild and free also draw reference to the movement forms we practice. Wise- calling on the wisdom traditions of yoga. Wild- the creative expression in dance. Free- expanding our capacity to enjoy our bodies through more feminine and flowing movement. In Qoya there is no way you can do it wrong, and the way you know you are doing it right is that it feels good."
330.title: Trust Your Intuition with Qoya
330.print_description: What would your life feel like if you trusted yourself? Explore that feeling through movement, community, ritual & a pilgrimage to this offering.

331.title: The "Game"
331.print_description: The Game”: love child of truth or dare, charades, post office, twister, spin the bottle, and "American's Got talent". Come see what can happen!
331.desc: Divinici was said to have "unquenchable curiosity" and "feverishly inventive imagination". When those same concepts are applied to social interaction, AMAZING things come in to existence.   The Game has a simple premise; Draw a card from the deck and the player does what is written. “The Game” has a tendency to create possibilities where there were once boundaries. Choices where there were once obstacles. “The Game”: the love child of truth or dare, charades, post office, twister, spin the bottle, and "American's Got talent".. “The Game” is perfect for letting one's imagination out to play. Watch what happens when permission is given to create, with wanton abandon. “The Game” is both a game of chance and skill if you want to believe that.  Remove a self-limiting perspective, gain new insights in creative problem solving.  Come play 'The Game'

336.desc:
Pop into the Bang Bang Wild Saloon Cocktail Lounge & Casino. Stroll through on your way out to The Playa, pop in on your way home from a sunrise session. Or Start the day fresh here. Be prepared to enter and RISK something, for every RISK, there is potential REWARD. What to RISK? Something tangible. Something creative. Something material. Something you are prepared to RISK. You decide!

Bigger the RISK leads to Bigger REWARD. Leave a shoe, leave a trinket, leave your pants, leave a love note, leave a bike, leave a song lyric, leave a dance, leave your glasses or leave Burner Fashion. Place it in the secret drawers and Bang Bang's Casino will decide the outcome.

Our giant Casino Games can help you win YOUR item back, or RISK the chance to win something more shiny, However chance loosing it all and see that item be gifted forward to others.

Once you play the Bang Bang Casino Games you drink all day at the Bang Bang Cocktail Bar. Every day a delightful cocktail is curated for your taste buds, there will be music playing at ambient levels to give the saloon atmosphere.

Casino Games: Aussie Two Up, Giant Dice, Human Roulette, Bingo Blitz & Giant Cards

Care not to risk something tangible? No worries mate, you can drink at the bar, everyone is welcome. BUT for every drink you feel like knocking back requires the Non-Riskers to have a spoonful of vegemite... or just harden up and TAKE A RISK, you only live once!

341.title: The President's Burning Man Divorce Party
341.print_description: Come celebrate #DivorceEquality and #ConsciousUncoupling! This is a black and white affair since Divorce is a GREY area!  #FREEDOM!!!
341.desc: Come celebrate #DivorceEquality and #ConsciousUncoupling! Because same sex marriages are still NOT recognized in Australia, President had to relocate from her home in Melbourne to Nevada for six weeks to get divorced from her ex-wife that she married in NYC.  Toast a glass of champagne to the darker side of Marriage Equality-- THE RIGHT TO DIVORCE! Thanks for joining us on this special day, and this is a black and white affair, because Divorce Equality is still a totally GREY AREA.  President loves a good party, so she will keep hosting a Burningman Divorce Party until all gay couples around the world can share in the right to Divorce!  If you have recently “uncoupled”, please join us in celebrating your freedom.

Under our dome we offer a tranquil oasis to nurture the most important connection of all: with one’s self.  Upon crossing the threshold to our world, the weary explorer will be guided through a Roman hand washing ritual complete with scented waters (+citric acid for the dust!) before being led to a cushioned couch where they will be feed and fed grapes and fan away the desert heat with palm-leaf fans.

357.title: Mad Sorcerer's Workshop
357.print_description: Craft colorful new worlds with the sorcery of play-doh and the transfiguration of mirrors.  Open 24-7 for children ages 2-102, materials provided.
357.desc:
Do you like Burning Man?  Do you like shiny lights?  Do you like play-doh?  We thought so.  This year, the NY Regional is combining all three, for the ultimate Midway interactive art trifecta at Burning Man.  

Each visitor to the Mad Sorcerer's Workshop creates one tiny clay creature and adds it to the world growing on the shelves of an infinity box.  Visitors are encouraged to interact with each other, to cooperate, and to let their imaginations roam, molding polka dot trees, green cows, castles, dinosaurs, and UFOs.  Make a blue fish, your friend can make a red bird, the next person will make a small man, together we'll have the beginnings of a whole new world, with the reflections of the infinity box making it look like there's whole schools and flocks of strange creatures and a crowd of people, all interacting.

You get to be the Mad Sorcerer, create whole worlds in your crystal ball, just to mess with them.  You get to say how creative and lovely your pet world will be.  There's no skill required, no creation too boring or too creative.  A red, and yellow and purple castle?  Yes!  A small brown snake?  Yes!  Every play-doh creature has a place with us.

Want to see how the project is going?  Want to Contribute and Volunteer? Like us at https://www.facebook.com/Mad-Sorcerer-1698581610391522/ for project updates and event announcements. 

Open 24-7, for kids of all ages, shade, play-doh and infinity box worlds provided.
357.other_location: We're a Guild Workshop at the Base of the Man

388.desc:
You are invited to this Heart Opening Tantra Puja. A Puja is a devotional offering. Through this sacred ceremony we can realize of the true nature of the Self and experience into the state of total oneness.
 
 This Tantra Puja is a way of honoring and adoring the divine that dwells within each of us. 
 
 What is a Heart Opening Puja? Watch here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=osqSdVTIZ_4
 
 This is a "station" puja. There is an inner and outer circle. One rotates and with each rotation you have a new partner. Each partnering is an opportunity to fall in love with ourselves through the eyes of another.
 
 The stations are subtle, elegantly simple and this is their potency. The tantric arts invite us into our own heart in an ease full way. One of the most exquisite is this ceremony where we open to an embodied experience of witnessing the divine in all and thus the diving in ourselves.
 
 Open to the possibility of adoration, forgiveness, unconditional love and experiencing your true and higher self in the span of a few short hours.
388.title: Tribal Tantra Heart Opening Puja
388.print_description: Rotational Circle Puja. Fall in love with self by falling in love with others one partner at a time. Profound experience of oneness and healing.

392.desc:
Morning Cock n' Tales is an interactive dome where you can come rest your feet after a long Night or Day on the Playa. Our specialty is morning Cocktails (think mimosas and palomas). We also have coffee for those not wanting to travel all the way to Center Camp and stand in the long lines. Besides our tasty beverages, we offer a welcoming atmosphere, comfortable seating, games, friendly conversations, and journals that we encourage guest to write (or draw) their TALES from the playa in. Each year the journals will make the annual journey home so they can added to and enjoyed again and again...
We open when the sun comes up (or whenever we feel like it), and stay serving most of the day (or until we are sick of it), always providing a place for weary burners to rest throughout the day and then kicking up the party at night.

411.desc: Achieving a sustainable future requires increasing our collective impact by aligning efforts within our communities and with broader initiatives.  Learn about leading international and national initiatives, including the UN's Agenda 2030 and Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) and UNESCO's new Global Action Programme (GAP) on education for sustainable development.  Explore examples of how schools, colleges, government agencies, and community programs are building tangible projects, resource tools, networks, and outreach efforts that increase education, training, and public awareness campaigns. 433.print_description: Burners make films over a 48 hour period here at BM! We'll start with a retrospective of films from previous years, then premiere this year's films!
433.desc:
Videogasm will again be host to The Black Rock City edition of The 48 Hour Film Project. Were groups of burners write, shoot and edit films over a 48 hour period to be shown at a festival on Thursday night. We'll start with a retrospective of short films produced at Burning Man in previous years and then premiere the shorts that will be produced at this years Burning Man!

Filmmakers: If you have a team and equipment, start at your leisure and follow the instructions on posters found at PlayaInfo and Videogasm (in Snowflake Village). If you're looking to form a team come to Videogasm at 3pm on Tuesday (8/30) to meet up with other like minded individuals. Film's should be under 10 minutes in length, contain the three ingredients (character, prop & line of dialog) listed on the posters mentioned above, and be brought to Videogasm by 8pm on Thursday (9/1). You can now shoot and edit a film on your smart phone, so get out there and make a film!

444.desc:
There are more than 50 million innocent displaced people that had to flee for war, poverty, injustice or climate change. The average stay of a refugee in a camp is 17 years. Since WWII the hosting and management of a refugee community in such camps has not changed. Till the day of today refugee camps are harsh survival environments where people risk exploitation, are hopeless and rules of the strongest apply. 

After being involved in the epicenter of the refugee crisis on the Greek island of Lesvos I came to the knowledge that there is such a big difference to be made in this global issue if we would stop seeing refugees, victims of injustice. Instead we should approach them as individuals with talents, opportunities equal to our own standards and with the same needs. We should be aware that if we would invest in people that have lost everything this investment will be returned to us in gratefulness and willingness to contribute in their own succes. You get what you give...

In creating communities that thrive you should start with environments that inspire. On Lesbos, the epicenter of the refugee crisis in Europe last year, I witnessed the similarities in dynamics between hosting refugees on a refugee camp and hosting a crowd on a music festival. We believe many insights from the festival industry can be integrated to redefine a refugee camp from a Spartan fashionlike environment to an inspiring festivallike experience.

Adding to the festival game innovative solutions/companies, educational programs and integration of the refugee community in the management and self-sustainability of their camp will create an environment of harmony and dignity that will be an example in how to change a global issue into an opportunity that can serve humanity on a global scale. 

Join me in this quest to redefine the global concept of a refugee camp to a campUS.
444.title: Camp To CampUS
444.print_description: The outdated global model of a refugee camp needs to change from a Spartan fashion like to a festival fashion like environment.

460.desc:
What the fuck is a spirit guide?     Find out how to walk in beauty, grace, and power by welcoming Father Jaguar, Mother Bear, and other plant and animal guides into your life.

barnaby;s: Get your head out of your default world arse and drop into  deep listening to surrender to your spirit guides.

What the fuck is a spirit guide, bro? Think of them as being like your guardian angels except way more badass. Get your head out of your default world arse and learn how to drop into a deep state of listening to connect with, surrender to, and listen the fuck up to your spirit guides. On any given day there is about a 100% chance that you're going to be doing some bullshit that you shouldn't be doing as a result of obstacles laid down by your subconscious. You're making baby elephant seals cry when you do that. Find out how to walk in beauty, walk in grace, walk in power by learning how to welcome Father Jaguar, Mother Bear, Uncle Eagle, Aunt Otter and many more into your life. Need to find a medicine man/woman/circle in your area? The session will end with shamanic networking session so that you can find and connect with healers off-playa to aid you in realizing your true nature. with Matt King

510.desc:
Hi everyone, come and get PLASTERED! ;o)

We humbly invite you all to “Becoming the Master/Mistress of Stones: The Arts of Buon Fresco!”

Welcome to the Burning Man Guild Workshops! For the first time ever, Burning Man is hosting a series of workshops in a Florentine piazza-style format to have Masters of various craftsmanship skills teach our students the arts of the Renaissance. 

We, The Three Faced (Stone) Wench Workshop/Guild, are offering a series of classes you would love to attend! 

Here’s the scoop:

Apprentices will learn the various actual old time techniques over several days to create a fresco (block) from scratch to take home. As part of our commitment to up-cycle, we will utilize and recycle actual (old foam insulation) building materials. Participants will learn to recreate various historical stone mixtures that compromise the the surfaces of the block, complete with plastering, cartooning, and finally the stages of painting the actual fresco with pigments. This artifact creation will be followed by (and applied) techniques to 'age' their artwork with the patina and craquelure of passing time. The result? A beautiful, yet portable and tangible, aged piece of buon fresco that becomes their momento of inspired learning at Burning Man. ;)

Upon completing your fresco block, you will receive a Playa Plastered Master of Arts certificate, authorizing you to be plastered anywhere on the playa!

That’s not all! 

We are offering a unique community project/event, and we invite everyone to participate with your hearts (and energy): 

We are accomplishing a recreation of Gustav Klimt’s Beethoven Frieze (Ode To Joy), with a slight twist on the theme: “All You Need Is Love.” The secco fresco artwork will stretch across several large panels, a moving tribute of the people lost at Orlando, Florida, and of our experiences at Burning Man. 

Please join us! ;o)

Youth ages 12 and up welcome.
510.title: The Arts of Buon Fresco Revealed
510.print_description: Let’s get PLASTERED! Apprentices will learn Art of Fresco. Upon completion of a fresco block, they’ll be CERTIFIED Plastered Master of the Playa!

534.desc:
"Begin with a tour of common design approaches and problems they present, followed with a brief description of Covalence and how it solves those problems.

Learn how to design with Fractal Graphs using Seeds and Core Axioms, then explore a practical example of Covalence in action with Emergence. 

Add depth with a thorough explanation of the Core Axioms of Covalence: Intentions, Relations, and Symmetries, and how Covalence is recursive in nature. 

End with a process exploration of Covalence: how the workshop itself came together using Covalence. Finally provide brief examples of Covalence observed at Burning Man and how participants can start identifying Covalence around them on the Playa. 

Q&A to Close
534.title: Creative Covalence
534.print_description: Transcend lateralization with Covalence: an ideation paradigm facilitating collaborative discovery with relational, intentional, and symmetric lensing

561.title: Play in the Desert Darkroom with Pinhole Project
561.print_description: Come develop photographs and play with us, we do pinhole photography! Pinhole Project invites you to help us in the Desert Darkroom!
561.desc: Come develop photographs and play with us, we do pinhole photography! Pinhole Project invites you to help us in the Desert Darkroom! We maintain a full wet black and white photographic darkroom in a shipping container, where we gather to processes, develop and fix about one hundred photographs. Photographs made of paper with traditional chemicals and no digital input. The Pinhole Project exposes 30 x 40 inch sheets of light sensitive gelatin silver paper. We work with 12 pinhole cameras, created out of 50-gallon cardboard barrels. This size is uniquely suited for capturing the incredible scale and immense diversity of art and culture at Black Rock City. Under the red safelights of the darkroom, photosensitive paper is inserted into the camera body. Exposures range from 40 to 300 seconds, where concentrated beams of sunlight are funnelled through the pinhole and into the camera, creating a negative image of the recorded subject. We maintain a desert darkroom in a shipping container, where we gather to processes, develop and fix about one hundred photographs each Burning Man. These unique images are then exhibited in Illumination Village, Center Camp Cafe, and off-playa. The pinhole camp has been creating large-scale portraits with festival participants since 1999.

623.desc: Join us to welcome Shabbat with prayer, reflection, ecstatic singing, and a vegetarian and vegan-friendly meal. Our service is rooted in the Jewish tradition, but all denominations and faiths are welcome to join hands and hearts. Come to our camp as the sun sets. We will welcome the sabbath as a sea of twinkling stars envelops us. After a service, songs, and time to reflect, we will guide you to our dining area and seat you at a communal bedouin-style table. BYO plate, cutlery, and drinks! We will nourish you with a multi-course meal, and ease you into the embrace of an evening in the dust.

630.desc:
We live in a shared dream, fractals of the same consciousness appreciating individuation. Within and without, our inner nature reflects into our outer reality. We can choose our vibrational frequency. A divine playmate can help enhance our ability to grow into new spaces in the universe considerably. 
 
 Acknowledging that we are the same self projecting through unique layerings of stories, we can assist one another in rebuilding the body, our temple for spirit. Reaching out into every direction of your universe and expanding consciousness with the breath, we can reactivate the energetic body together. 
 
 We'll be delving into how to realign the spine, our antenna to unity consciousness using acro yoga paired with kundalini energetic healing. The physical body is the intermediary for every dimension of our existence. By arousing kundalini energy the practitioner can activate third eye so that the distortions may be witnessed as they are released.
 
 We are our own best healer. Working together we can amplify the effects of our alchemical growth while releasing post traumatic stress from past lives and feeling trust again.

Enjoy the work shop, some grateful dead music and spend some time in the Leopard Lounge while your creation soaks in the soda ash bath... Peace

645.title: Experience Channeling Authentic Expression
645.print_description: Through voice and movement, performance and flow-a workshop of playful exploration resulting in deeply powerful embodiment. Led by improv opera singer
645.desc:
"Focusing on communication through voice and movement, performance and flow- an interactive workshop of playful exploration that results in deeply powerful embodiment.
An improvisatory opera singer and performance artist, Amanda Gregory (Xeno Glossya) guides the participants through unique exercises that unlock authentic expression and create the experience of true awe in your friends and/or audience. 
This workshop reveals the golden ticket to “Life is a Stage.”  With newfound facility to calibrate audience and harvest creative potential, participants will discover how to fully surrender into the here and now with effortless performance agility.  
Attendees will gain tools in creating those quintessential jaw-dropping moments one never forgets, with an ever expanding ability to channel archetypes with voice, movement, and being.
And finally- unbridled embodiment.  Paired with heightened listening and awareness, your performance and interactions will profoundly impact your internal experience, and connections with others. "

646.desc:
Calling all visionaries, healers and change makers.  Join us for the Planetary Peace Project's Sacred Theater Ritual at  Burning Man's largest structure, The Catacombs where we will be Opening the Portal to Planetary Peace.  Friends, the time is upon us. Drawing on the profound energy of the playa, we will presence the sacred dream of planetary peace knowing this is not only possible - it is the only way forward for humankind. It is time to claim this dream and bring it into our bodies, our lives, and our Earth.

Meet us at The Catacombs & 10 o'clock to co-create a Sacred Theater Ritual that will take place deep within the Catacombs and within ourselves. Together we will call forth forgiveness, personal healing, and embodied peace.  Bring your creativity and playfulness. Wear white if you can. Bring singing bowls, bells, gongs and your desire to co-create planetary peace through one of the largest sacred theater rituals on the planet.
646.title: Planetary Peace Project - Sacred Theater Ritual
646.print_description: Opening the Portal to Planetary Peace, together we will call forth forgiveness, personal healing,  and embodied peace. It's time! Bring bells & gongs.

653.title: Use the Force. Benevolent Manipulation.
653.print_description: Use Skill, Alchemy & Insight to Manipulate Light (like a Prism does) into a Beautiful Rainbow of Inspiration. Bring Intentional Awareness
653.desc:
"Unbraiding the social stigmas knotted around the “evils of manipulation” and learning to see how a shift in perspective gives power to intentional benevolent skillful action on behalf of others.
 Alchemy requires truly seeing and embracing all elements at play in order to transmute them (the situation/circumstance) into its highest form.
 Manipulate happiness into your friends, Seduce and inspire their best qualities to come out and play. Manipulate yourself out of your own implosive self sabotage and towards your best expression.
 Manipulation implies taking advantage, So lets do Just That! What if I took advantage of your company and friendship to inspire my own joy? What If I took advantage of simple understanding of social cues and behaviors to make you feel safer in This moment than the Last moment?
 Through Intelligent, Benevolent, Skillful actions we can amplify the environment within our own beings, and the external environment to our highest collective benefit."

Explore our Odditorium of Playa Wonders, anyone is a musician on our world-famous Corndog Calliope, and prepare to be amazed, bemused, and not excused, from our Midnite Magic Shows (at 1PM and 11:PM).

And for a few lucky winners, a trip around BRC on your choice of the Train of Thought OR the Paper Playa Plane. You literally cannot lose!

656.desc:
Now in it’s 3rd year Straya Day is an Australian themed BBQ party with Australian food and drinks to try, fun games to play and some rocking Aussie tunes. 

Whether you’re one of us or just enjoy our silly accents come and enjoy some fair dinkum Australian culture, dinky-di beer and ridgy-didge food on us. Play some Goon of Fortune, give cricket a burl, hug a koala or belt out some Aussie pub anthems. This is the official meet up for Aussies on the playa but we also really want to share our culture with our American (and other) friends so everyone is welcome! You’d have to be mad as a cut snake to miss it!

If you’re an Aussie headed over for the burn and you’d like to help out by smuggling in some Cherry Ripes, Fantales or even maybe a bottle of Bundy track us down on Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/groups/BurningManAussies2016/) and give us a shout.

677.title: Phrygianism and the Refoamation
677.print_description: Creative direct action as an art form. Adam Eidinger speaks about Phrygianism which combines citizen action and psychedelics.
677.desc:
Adam Eidinger spills the beans on organizing creative direct action as an art form. A leader in the camp Refoamation, Adam's philosophy of Phrygianism combines citizen action, psychedelics and civil defense.  In 2014 Adam legalized marijuana in Washington, DC and will talk strategy.  He'll also speak about the Liberty Cap and its role for thousands of years connecting liberation struggles since Roman times as well the to cap's connection to psychedelic spirituality in the Mithra tradition

Adam has been arrested 18 times fighting for justice in the Belly of the Beast, Washington, DC.  He is the social action director for Dr. Bronner's Magic Soaps and is the foam OG who first set up the magic foam at Burning Man with Kris Bronner in 2009.  Since then he's helped lead the Dr. Bronner' camp (called Refoamation in 2016) as it has expanded its perfoaming activities.  Adam has been making creative plans for major protests since 2000.  His talk will reveal practical tips and advice for anyone activist or non-activist.  Adams lives by the creed of Ralph Nader who once said, "If you don't turn onto politics, politics will turn on you."

679.title: Country Club Wine Tasting
679.print_description: Hold onto your balls and enjoy our serene par 5 mini golf course all tee'd off with nightly wine tastings to lubricate the action
679.desc:
We're bringing the finest country club experience to Black Rock City! Relax in the comfort of our lawn chairs under the shade of the palm trees. Visit our wine bar to socialize with other high-class guests like yourself. If you're feeling energetic you can find a tee time at our challenging and memorable par-5 3-hole golf course. If you have any issues during your stay, our attentive staff and can help with any and all needs.

In terms of events, we'll have daily wine and cheese tastings at 9pm with the finest string cheeses, and canned cheeses paired with the most sought after wines cardboard boxes can deliver. 691.title: Shamata and Walking Meditation
691.print_description: Bring your neurotic mind, tame it, and go enjoy your burn having a sense of who the fuck you really are. Connect with your true grounded self.
691.desc:
Bring your neurotic mind, tame it, and go enjoy your burn having a sense of who the fuck you really are. Connect with your true grounded self.

I have practiced this meditation by myself for about 2 years. I am curious to see how this will work in a group setting as this would be a new experience for me. It is an open-eye meditation technique that focuses on the breath while also taking in your surroundings. The walking meditation focuses on the sensation your feet feel while walking at a slow place in a small circle. This practice helps form a connection with the earth as a sense of grounding. With practice, this technique helps one discover who they really are, not who they feel they are supposed to be. It has done wonders for me and truly changed my life. The instructions are very brief and basic and each person's experience is unique.

716.desc: Indigenous people across the globe have used sacred plant medicines for millennia to heal, illuminate and connect them to the web of life. Each of these psychoactive medicines needs a healer to connect them to their patients: the shaman. This investigative-adventure documentary show examines not just these shamanic medicines, but the shamans that wield them. If, as Marshall McLuhan said, we are now a “global village”, then we need our own healers that understand the deep power and sacredness these plant medicines can reveal.  Film screening followed by Filmmakers Q&A session.
716.title: Shamans of the Global Village - Film Screening
716.print_description: Come on a journey into the world of modern shamanism with Western practitioners and see never before filmed footage of ancient medicine practices.

759.title: Dying with time to spare: A nomad's journey home
759.print_description: A deep dive into death, suffering and challenging fate through simple physical practices - opening the heart and accepting what life has to give.
759.desc:
A deep dive into death, suffering and challenging fate through simple physical practices - opening the heart and accepting what life has to give.
In many cultures death is seen as the unknown, the point at which it is difficult to determine what happens next. Will death be the end of life? The pain experienced in the lead-up to death or the manner death is portrayed may have lasting impressions on how we determine our own death. If death is a passage and a natural step, like a leaf that falls and disintegrates into the earth, how do we best prepare to be ready, at a moments notice to fall onto earth, without a shred of remorse, guilt or unpacked potential? This workshop is about giving yourself a chance to look deeper into death with a clean slate. Determine your own method to prepare for death and live life with an openness to dying. The heart-opening exercises are done alone, and with the group using resonance tuning, energy-centering and creative visualisation. Raise your consciousness!  with Tia Kansara

>> BONUS EVENT AT SHAMANDOME:  Want an Opportunity to create your Spirit/Power Animal in art after your Shamanic Journey ?

765.title: See Your Light, Love Your Light- True Reflections
765.print_description: Come see for yourself the Sparkle in your Eyes from the Light in your Soul.  These True Reflection mirrors reflect you as you are. Truly magical!
765.desc:
A True Reflections Palace - showcasing mirrors that do not reverse left and right!

Come see the sparkle in your eyes from the light in your soul.  These mirrors reflect you as you are, not reversed, and are truly magical!  

Theres both science and an art here - your face "works" when you see it as it truly is.  In contrast it stops working, and you tend to stare at yourself in mirrors. Then get self-critical all too often. Even if you are feeling wonderful, like all so many times at Burning Man, a mirror doesn't reflect it naturally, so you tend to lose that sparkle and start to question your good feelings.  

In contrast, when you look in one of these true reflection mirrors, your face keeps working!  Your eyes, which have so much beautiful information in them, continue to have that same information that you can see.  This is what we see and read so well when we look at you.  That sparkle when you are happy, that depth when you are being deep, that vitality and genuineness that we know about you, now you can see it too!  So easy to believe in yourself when you see all that true energy you have. 

The result?  Expect to be absolutely floored.  You are an amazing creature - a Human Being, and now you can see what that really looks, and feels like.  The feedback loop you find yourself in now is clear and complete, so smiles look like real smiles and you will smile back.  Complete with sparkle!!! Beautiful!

There's lots of posters in the Palace (which is made from giant tinker style toys) to explain it all.  If you don't see the magic, ask one of us for a demo and explanation. .. we want to get you to your own AHA moment!   

Note-this is the same Palace that has been under the Man, on Playa, on Esplanade and in Center Camp!  Don't Miss It - Its Magic!

Dress to impress in your finest golden attire and rub shoulders with other VIPs in our swanky Air Screwed Saloon! 

You know those moments when you are in such a grooved up playafied space you just want to scream from the depths of your soul "I AM A GOLDEN GOD!!"?!?  Oh Yah!,  This is THAT KINDA PARTY!!

787.title: Recycle Your Aluminum Cans
787.desc: Making drinking plans for your camp? Do those plans include lots and lots of cans? Want to unload those empty cans on playa while also helping the city of Gerlach? Well come on down to Recycle Camp and SHOW US YOUR CANS!!!  At Recycle Camp we want all of your ALUMINUM cans as part of our gift to the playa. We are located at 6 and Center Circle behind the Center Camp Cafe and will be open every day until 5pm. No drop offs allowed, when you get there you will help us quickly separate your cans before riding the Crushinator, our magical bicycle-powered can crushing apparatus, to compact the cans so we can store as many as possible before scrapping the aluminum off-site. All of the money we generate from can recycling is donated to the Gerlach school system. We only accept aluminum cans so please keep all of your soup or heavy metal cans. If you are unsure if it is aluminum a good rule of thumb is if you can't crush it, then we don't want it. Also, some stout beers like Guinness also have a plastic widget that cannot be recycled with the aluminum, please remove of be conscious of it before bringing them to us. PROTIP from the Recyclenauts: bring a MESH bag to store all of your cans in. Plastic bags won't allow your cans to dry out, so please store them in a mesh bag before bringing them over to Recycle Camp and help make things a little less juicy for us when we crush them. Be smart, plan ahead, Recycle Camp wants YOU to come CRUSH it with us!!! We are CLOSED ON MONDAY, plan ahead!

790.desc:
Hi everyone, come and get PLASTERED! ;o)

We humbly invite you all to “Becoming the Master/Mistress of Stones: The Arts of Buon Fresco!”

Welcome to the Burning Man Guild Workshops! For the first time ever, Burning Man is hosting a series of workshops in a Florentine piazza-style format to have Masters of various craftsmanship skills teach our students the arts of the Renaissance. 

We, The Three Faced (Stone) Wench Workshop/Guild, are offering a series of classes you would love to attend! 

Here’s the scoop:

Apprentices will learn the various actual old time techniques over several days to create a fresco (block) from scratch to take home. As part of our commitment to up-cycle, we will utilize and recycle actual (old foam insulation) building materials. Participants will learn to recreate various historical stone mixtures that compromise the the surfaces of the block, complete with plastering, cartooning, and finally the stages of painting the actual fresco with pigments. This artifact creation will be followed by (and applied) techniques to 'age' their artwork with the patina and craquelure of passing time. The result? A beautiful, yet portable and tangible, aged piece of buon fresco that becomes their momento of inspired learning at Burning Man. ;)

Upon completing your fresco block, you will receive a Playa Plastered Master of Arts certificate, authorizing you to be plastered anywhere on the playa!

That’s not all! 

We are offering a unique community project/event, and we invite everyone to participate with your hearts (and energy): 

We are accomplishing a recreation of Gustav Klimt’s Beethoven Frieze (Ode To Joy), with a slight twist on the theme: “All You Need Is Love.” The secco fresco artwork will stretch across several large panels, a moving tribute of the people lost at Orlando, Florida, and of our experiences at Burning Man. 

Please join us! ;o)

Youth ages 12 and up welcome.
790.title: The Arts of Buon Fresco Revealed
790.print_description: Let’s get PLASTERED! Apprentices will learn Art of Fresco. Upon completion of a fresco block, they’ll be CERTIFIED Plastered Master of the Playa!

795.title: The Orgasamator Experience
795.print_description: The Orgasamator offers intense physical pleasure in an environment that's safe, comfortable, sensual & private.  Exit refreshed & smiling.
795.desc: The legendary Orgasmatron first came to the playa in 2002, and it provided exceptional physical pleasure to thousands of women in an environment that was safe, comfortable, sensual and private. Five years ago we completely redesigned the machine for even greater intensity and enjoyment, and gave it a new name: The Orgasamator. When you visit, you will be in a private room with an operator who is experienced, very sensitive to your needs and concerns, who listens well and is deeply dedicated to giving you an amazing experience. Your specific needs and desires will be discussed at the beginning, and the experience will be fine-tuned to give you exactly what you want. No penetration is involved, but sexy talk and sensual touch are available options. We want everyone to feel refreshed and respected when they leave. We are strongly focused on cleanliness and health, along with fun. Come solo, or bring a good friend (male or female) to add another dimension to this deeply immersive and wonderfully personal experience. Wear as much or as little as you would like, you can stop any time if the pleasure becomes too intense. If you are a woman, 18+, the Orgasamator Experience is something you won't want to miss. Lines are shortest early in the week, and early in the day.

797.desc:
Pop into the Bang Bang Wild Saloon Cocktail Lounge & Casino. Stroll through on your way out to The Playa, pop in on your way home from a sunrise session. Or Start the day fresh here. Be prepared to enter and RISK something, for every RISK, there is potential REWARD. What to RISK? Something tangible. Something creative. Something material. Something you are prepared to RISK. You decide!

Bigger the RISK leads to Bigger REWARD. Leave a shoe, leave a trinket, leave your pants, leave a love note, leave a bike, leave a song lyric, leave a dance, leave your glasses or leave Burner Fashion. Place it in the secret drawers and Bang Bang's Casino will decide the outcome.

Our giant Casino Games can help you win YOUR item back, or RISK the chance to win something more shiny, However chance loosing it all and see that item be gifted forward to others.

Once you play the Bang Bang Casino Games you drink all day at the Bang Bang Cocktail Bar. Every day a delightful cocktail is curated for your taste buds, there will be music playing at ambient levels to give the saloon atmosphere.

Casino Games: Aussie Two Up, Giant Dice, Human Roulette, Bingo Blitz & Giant Cards

Care not to risk something tangible? No worries mate, you can drink at the bar, everyone is welcome. BUT for every drink you feel like knocking back requires the Non-Riskers to have a spoonful of vegemite... or just harden up and TAKE A RISK, you only live once!

820.desc: From light to dark, runny to viscous to crystallized, raw honey embodies the diversity of communities around the world—one hive next to another has as different a personality ranging from relaxed and buzzy to aggressive and defensive.  Ann with an E and RamonaMayhem invite BRC BeePpl to the dHive bar to taste the ambrosia of the flowers and the trees produced by the honeybee. We also educate people on adulterated honey (over filtered, pasteurized, and HFCS added) and provide a sample of that as well.  Get your proboscis wet as we honey lovers stick together!  Easiest way to find the dHive bar is to look for our Do More Now 7 story fire building on 7:30 & Beeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee!  Bzzzz!
820.title: Raw Honey Tastings from around the world!
820.print_description: Wonder why honey is light, dark, runny, or viscous?  Come taste and find out many of nature's finest secrets from the only food we eat from an insect!

856.desc: Bringing out childhood memories and mixing them in with adult libations, comes Scotch & Hop. Combining the fun game of Hop Scotch with one of the most wonderful beverages to grace the planet, Scotch makes for an entertaining and social area where people from all areas, and even all ages (with Children, being the under-21 crowd,) creating a silly and fun set of events bringing out the child in all of us. The social events for Scotch & Hop take different types and games of Hop Scotch from all over the world, and have people jump around and play various forms of the game. Once a Black Rock citizen, who is over 21, has completed a game, they are invited in for a Scotch or Scotch cocktail. (And usually we include other adult-beverages.) Getting young and old, from all across the planet, together and playing Hop Scotch makes people remember the silliness of when they were kids. Also being able to have children be able to play along in the games opens up the experience to everyone.
856.title: Scotch & Hop: Scotch Bar
856.print_description: Bring out childhood memories and mixing them in with adult libations, Hop Scotch & Scotch. (All ages welcome, 21+ to enjoy Scotch).

857.desc: Join us for an intro to Capoeira class and a round table discussion about the relationship between culturally-rooted movement and cultural appropriation versus appreciation. We will discuss what it is like to be an insider/outsider in a world of a movement style with a complex history of liberation ideology.

Leopard Mafia returns for its THIRD year at Black Rock City!
Please join us in your best spotted beastly ensemble!
The celebration commences at Funky Town at 4 30 pm located at 10 and italic! Cocktails and body moving beats to shake your tail ! Bring out the inner sexy beast!

861.title: Start your own town!
861.print_description: Step by step on how to make the community of your dreams a reality!  several communities in Costa Rica!!
861.desc: It sometime seems as if things are grim and change could just never come about in the places where we live. With extreme divide in our government, a broken food system and environmental degradation continuously getting worse, what can we possibly do to change things? I say, start an ecological community with all of your favorite people in the most ideal climate where conscious choice and intentional design are integral to your decision making. I will guide you on my journey in Costa Rica in creating community on a crystal clear river with deep pools where dripping fruit trees line the roads and neighbors care about each other and are dedicated to improving our world.

862.desc: DIYers! Learn how to make a simple rocket stove that uses recycled paper pellets or twigs for fuel. 863.title: Socially Appropriate Fart Day
863.print_description: It's not like you have to pack it out or anything. Today you can feel free to fart any old time as loudly and as smellily as you want!
863.desc: It's not like you have to pack it out or anything. You don't even have to go down the block with a spare roll of toilet paper. Just do it right where you are. It's time to celebrate our farts and acknowledge that it's about time we got over that harmless smell. What's the big deal? You're human for christsake! Today you can feel free to fart any old time as loudly and as smellily as you want!

864.desc:
“We practice what we leech,” 5&F

Calling all disciples of experience and burnt Burners! The Liminal Apothakary Pharmakon is thy primo source for all things mat’ria medica, as determined by our staff of doubtfully artful Plague Doctors, Barber Surgeons, and Sinister Sisters schooled in the non-curative arts and doctrine of signatures.

Bringeth out thy almost-dead and try our all legal, possibly effective elixirs, tonics, stimulants, and placebos.* We’ll humor thy Humours and purify thy souls** with a selection of compounds from melancholy black bile to sanguine sweet blood. Witch-testing and disposal, vials and poisons may be offered for an extra cost, dependent on practitioner’s interest or whim or in consultation with internal voices.

– Approved by the Worshipful Society of Apothakaries and the Guild of Pepperers –

* Smalleth print: all “treatment” subject to accepted insurance. In keeping with local regulations, the Liminal Apothakary Pharmakon shall no longer releaseth evil spirits via a drilled hole in thy head.

** Soul purification not guaranteed. We apologize for any inconvenience.
864.title: Apothakary Pharmakon by Liminal Labs
864.print_description: Dazed & hazy? Come to Pharmakon & chooseth from an apothecary menu full of salubrious nostrums, plausible elixirs, and vitamin-rich restoratives. @5&F

875.title: Merkaba: Tasting The Infinite Through Breath
875.print_description: Breath-work and guided journey where you will learn how to 'plug ourselves into the Infinite’ and co-create a Merkaba Light Body Activation
875.desc:
In this dynamic presentation & event participants will literally learn and practice how to 'plug themselves into the Infinite.' Utilizing our physiology and breath we will be co-creating a Merkabah Light Body Activation.
Merkabah activation is a 3000 years old breathing technique that allows to open a portal in our heart chakra. This will bring us to feel the vibrations and the energy of the universe. The intensity of the technique depends on the person, ranging from an incredible feeling of ecstasy, until space and time journeys. Being a technique that connects with the inner and higher self, it will also allows to experience breakthroughs, get answers about our lives, solve problems that we didn't even know to have. The more open to receive love and the more open minded we will be, the more we will get from this practice. The technique is as powerful as magical. Almost everybody that have experienced it, described it as mind blowing, many as life changing, some others as the most powerful moment of their life.
Prepare to experience yourself in Totality!

905.title: We are Story Telling Animals Seminar / Discussion
905.print_description: Stories give us insight into how others think & feel. What actually is a story? What makes a story engage? Join our romp about Storytelling. Espresso
905.desc: Stories: That’s how we have communicated, well I guess as long as we have been able to communicate.  We used stories to pass on information, persuade, and entertain. Stories told by others give us insight into how they think and feel.  When we hear something in a story that we connect with we don’t feel so alone in our own thoughts. Truth is, we are much more likely to remember something if we hear it in a story then just the facts. Humans are social beings and enjoy others for the most part and listing to stories gives us that connection.  But what actually makes up a story? And better yet what makes up a compelling story that engages your audience? Join Writer / Director Robert Hargreaves MFA Screen Writing for this seminar / discussion about Storytelling and Story Tellers. We will be serving Espresso Shots & Cookies

915.desc: The legendary Orgasmatron first came to the playa in 2002, and it provided exceptional physical pleasure to thousands of women in an environment that was safe, comfortable, sensual and private. Five years ago we completely redesigned the machine for even greater intensity and enjoyment, and gave it a new name: The Orgasamator. When you visit, you will be in a private room with an operator who is experienced, very sensitive to your needs and concerns, who listens well and is deeply dedicated to giving you an amazing experience. Your specific needs and desires will be discussed at the beginning, and the experience will be fine-tuned to give you exactly what you want. No penetration is involved, but sexy talk and sensual touch are available options. We want everyone to feel refreshed and respected when they leave. We are strongly focused on cleanliness and health, along with fun. Come solo, or bring a good friend (male or female) to add another dimension to this deeply immersive and wonderfully personal experience. Wear as much or as little as you would like, you can stop any time if the pleasure becomes too intense. If you are a woman, 18+, the Orgasamator Experience is something you won't want to miss. 933.print_description: When Reverbia Live Nights ends, The Chill Dome Till Dawn Begins.  Warm body and Soul inside this interactive LED and Soundscape Cosmic Experience.
933.desc: When Reverbia Live Nights ends…The Chill Dome Till Dawn begins.  Come warm up your body, while your mind and soul journey into the depths of Cosmic Universe.  The Chill Dome Till Dawn is our featured interactive LED and Soundscape Experience, where lights move to sound and sound moves within your mind.  After Hours at Reverbia, The Chill Dome Till Dawn will present live instrumental deep chill ambient music layered upon multi track recordings of cosmic soundscapes.  Detach, Explore, Connect, Envision!!!  Artists are TBA for The Chill Dome Till Dawn.

934.desc: Flow Arts include a variety of movement-based disciplines including dance, juggling, fire-spinning, and object manipulation that harmonize skill-based techniques with creative expression to achieve a state of present-moment awareness known as Flow. We’d love to introduce any and all of you interested in flowing to the different types of Flow Arts...hooping, poi, staff, etc. Flow newbies and experts welcome!

935.title: Burner Toastmasters Speak-A-Thon and Get Together
935.print_description: We’re back, so let’s do it again! Are U a Toastmaster? Bring your manual, friends. A wannabe? Join us for a great meet-up, photos, and fond memories!
935.desc:
Like to speechify? Pontificate? Step up to ye olde soap box? We’ve got you covered. While there's some jargon in the notes below that our wannabe’s might not understand, we assume the Toastmasters folks will get it. And you will soon! Note:
Bring your TI Magazine and we’ll take pics over at the Man! If you’re a Toastmaster and couldn’t be in Washington, DC, for their August International Convention, then bring your CC/CL/other manuals you’d like to advance in, and join us (with friends) for a real Toastmasters meeting - and some photos! We plan to cram in speeches, evaluations, and table topics into a one hour session, or more if demand exists for it, so on time is a good thing. Prompt arrivals will have the best chances for the most fun and credit.
Looking to join in? Pepperland theme camp, Tuesday, 1-2PM.  Email: Gerflash (at) socal (dot) rr (dot) com. so we can plan ahead and count you in.
Just maybe - the pix we take might make it into the TI Magazine! You’ll actually be Toastmastering on-Playa!

958.desc:
Soulistica hosts special Kava ceremonies at Sunset every day during events. These ceremonies provide grounding and a smooth transition into the night's festivities. 

A well prepared Kava potion drunk in small quantities produces only pleasant changes in behavior. It is therefore a slightly stimulating drink which helps relive great fatigue.  It relaxes the body after strenuous efforts, clarifies the mind and sharpens the mental faculties.

Come join Soulistica in honoring the Sun and Kava while we exchange knowledge and stories!

Soulistica will be hosting a Kava ceremony Monday-Friday 8:30-9:00pm

980.desc: Our hot Latin Party is all about expressing ourselves and pura vida! The Latin American culture is a colorful mix of races, traditions and expressions that have evolved over the years, all bound by a common love for music and dancing.  We will share this connection by combining different styles of music, such as Cumbia Villera (Chile/Argentina), Bachata (Colombia), Axe (Brazil), and Merengue (Dominican Republic), in one unique dancing event (Latin music is not just about Salsa!).   Our two “Maestros” will teach essential dance moves for each style… while enforcing the Latin proverb: Nobody cares how you dance, just do it with passion!  This event will bring to life the deep connection that defines the Latin culture.

980.print_description: Learn Cumbia, Bachata, Merengue in one unique dancing event featuring the Margarita-Bike! Nobody cares how you dance, just do it with passion!

987.title: 5th Annual International Beekeepers Summit!  >'='<
987.print_description: Beek out & join beekeepers from around the world to discuss the all things honeybee.  No previous experience necessary-learn to buzz anywhere! Bzzz!!!
987.desc: Beekeepers and wannabees come together for a hivemind discussion of all things bee.  Want to be a beekeeper but don’t know where to start?  Live in an urban area but have concerns about zoning &/or neighbors?  Have a theory on sustainable varroa mite management?  Opinions on which bee between the Italian, Carnolian, Russian, & Africanized bees make the best honey? Healthy Queen propagation and management?  How about a pollen patty recipe you want to share? We will discuss Beekeeping 101, suggest excellent reading materials, and who knows?  You may even have a little honey on your lips as you depart!  If a flock is to seagulls, what’s a group of beekeepers?  An argument!!!  (This summit does not require prior experience—we encourage wannabeekeepers to attend as there will be a lot of BuzzInn going on)!!!  Beek out with us!  Find us near the Do More Now's 7 story firehouse on 7:30 & Beeeeeee!

1000.desc: Pink Heart Radio 103.3 FM - Lighthouse for Mind Body & Soul - Our 24/7 programming will inspire you to be the BEST YOU. We have curated the best loved HugNation talks by Halcyon (one of Pink Heart Camp’s founders), plus captivating lectures from the best thinkers around. In between the spoken words are sounds and songs from every corner of the globe that will delight the senses. Daily special programming will include Sunrise Meditations, followed by an amazing mix of aural art for the remaining desert daylight. Sunset Music Sets, will surely center the mind for the conscious night ahead. From the edge of midnight and beyond, Pink Heart – HeadSpace will include long, chill, music sets simulcast for HeadSpace the Mutant Vehicle as the soundtrack for deep playa gifting experiences. In a Live Event, Pink Heart Radio will broadcast Halcyon’s HugNation - Thursday 12 to 1pm.

1001.title: Himalayan Singing Bowls:> Oceanic Subconsciousness
