1001.desc:
Sonic painting of sweet overtones by a choir of Antique Bowls in true harmony with self.  
Namaste dear Human Beings. Take a dive inside the sonic painting of sweet overtones produced by the choir of Antique Himalayan Singing Bowls. 
Receive a well-deserved deep healing as you walk on your path. The hypnotic sound of True Harmony will help you burst open your Heart, heal your Soul from past traumas, refresh your Optimal Body and clear your ever expanding Mind for Wisdom from the Universe. 
Absorb the energy of the highest quality instruments. Experience a deep connection with Singing Bowls played by the hands and soul of a man that deeply respects and knows how to communicate with them.  
Facilitators: Guy Yair Beider  and Clara Zoharsky

1002.desc: We will explore ideas and items from the past that can be used today to help us live a more sustainable lifestyle by cutting back on waste and energy usage. The universe is preparing you for something much greater and like a sling shot, it’s going to shoot you forward, but you just have to move backwards for a little bit. “Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow.” ~Albert Einstein . Mike BIlbo, LNT master with anti-plastic blogger activist, Beth Terry.
1002.title: Going Backwards to Go Forward
1002.print_description: Explore practical ideas and items from the past to help us live a sustainable lifestyle by cutting back on waste and energy usage. M. Bilbo & B Terry

1020.desc: Recently, Burning Man has been criticized for its homogeneous population and its increasing income disparity issue. Despite being widely recognized around the world by different ethnic groups, faiths, and sexualities, Burning Man struggles to achieve representative diversity. Disco Chateau celebrates diversity and would like to share inclusion practices that have worked for us, as well as welcome others from different camps to discuss what has worked for them. This talk will invite community leaders to discuss Default World and On Playa empowerment, for a more diverse, inclusive and representative tomorrow.

1108.desc: At this point, my husband and I decided to take stock, stop time and start living.  We have been working and living remotely for 15 months.  We've been to ashrams, meditation centres, Iceland, Vietnam, Cambodia, started a business in India, and met the most incredible people.  Currently, we're living in our RV touring north America before heading to Africa to work with a non profit we've been working with remotely (Pro bono work on their business operations).

1112.desc:
Grab some tea and join me for an experience driven by Synesthesia, the ability to see and feel color. My practice began as a simple way to relieve stress. I started asking friends if I could paint their auras and came to find that my impressions of color and energy aligned with the individual's current state of being. The process requires a hint of vulnerability and casual conversation. Using oil and chalk pastels I will create an image of the energy you emit.
The process can take 15 to 30 minutes depending on the complexity of the aura. It is my passion to capture the aura in its nautical beauty. 
Upon completion, I give an interpretation of the aura,
1112.title: Aura Painting
1112.print_description: I interpret and analyze Auras using oil and chalk pastel.

1113.title: Lawless and Disordered, BRC
1113.print_description: Head and Heart Disagree, You need the drama of a courtroom to find resolution.  We provide the court, you supply the quandary in a case of You v You
1113.desc: Internal conflict? Head and Heart disagree? Clearly you need the drama of a courtroom (court-shade structure) to find resolution! We will zealously represent both sides of you in the case of You vs. You. We’ll also supply the judge, the bailiff, and a psychological expert witness. You bring your conflict, and any witnesses that can shed light on it. A jury of your burner peers will hear the evidence and render a verdict for one side of you.

Are you capable of staying still for around one minute? Then we have a gift for you!! Come on down to Camp HELLO!, We Love you! For a totally custom tailored Long-exposure photographic experience!
Our resident Light Painter Reid "Gadget" Dogpaw will be creating 100% Unedited 200%  awesome Light painting portraits for ALL of the awesome burners we can muster up! Pick a pose that represents WHO YOU ARE! Answer a few questions to help us get to know you and what you love, and FREEZE while we jump into action illustrating a world of color all around you while a camera captures it all! Images are FREE in FULL RESOLUTION to all participants! Let us paint your light for all to see and go home with a compressed slice of reality to remember your burn by! 
WHY YOU ASK!? BECAUSE HELLLOOOOOOOO! We Love you!! (duh)

1150.desc:
Now that Burning Man has become a maker fair under the aegis of the Renaissance Faire, there is a lot more than the usual dust up over the direction and identity of this quaint event in the Nevada desert. This year’s dust shall be comprised of marble, sandstone, oak, and pewter, a highly controversial mixture never before introduced to the Black Rock desert. Because they don’t mess around when it comes to preserving intact the native chemical profile of the immediate environment of the Black Rock desert, the Bureau of Land Management has mandated extra precautions for 2016. As such, the BLM has required that BMOrg retain the services of the French Maid Brigade. It’s nothing we wouldn’t be doing anyway. 

Rendezvous with us! You too can be one of the sexiest clean freaks on the playa—please bring: feather dusters, rags, dustbusters, service carts, vacuums, white gloves, latex gloves, enema kits, lube, and any other useful cleaning equipment. Join us in uniform with your surly attitude and worst possible French accent.

On Thursday at 2:00 pm we meet at 3 O’Clock and Esplanade then dust our way through every filthy, nasty camp on our march toward that dust bucket known as Center Camp Café, liberate them from their dusty oppression, and celebrate our triumph!

It's the ReNoodlification! 

In the end times, the noodles shall save us, the noodles shall give us life, the noodles shall be our guide! An earlier, second, noodle extravaganza for those who aren't as night-owley, or possibly younger than others. Noodles dispensed with glee and abandon! Bad jokes! Pink monkeys!

Get'cher tasty noodles. We'll have 'em till we don't, you'll slurp 'em down till they're gone. Delicious noodles, yummy hot dog pieces, everything you need for evening fun!

AND BEFORE YOU ASK:
Not gluten free, not vegan. Seriously, stop asking, the hot dogs should be a dead giveaway.

1209.desc: Playfully Yours is now a Village with 4 camps. Playfully Yours Dungeon is a play space for you to learn and experience sensation play in our well-equipped dungeon. We encourage beginners, intermediates and those curious about BDSM play to come, learn, and experience in a safe, non-pressured, and supervised environment. As our name implies (Playfully Yours), we focus on the lighter, softer, and more sensual side of BDSM. Our personnel are available to provide instructions and demonstrations on the safe use of the equipment and will supervise play or can help facilitate play.  We’ll also have an outdoor dungeon play area equipped with a double St Andrews Cross, spanking bench, and stock. We also have a lounge area where you can relax and meet our campmates if you are over 21 years old with id. The lounge has a spanking bike, a corn hole bean bag game, lounge chairs, a mini bar serving cherry bombs, and a spinning wheel to facilitate participation. In Mist’R Cool’s Camp you can have the Cool Mist Experience with a fully automated misting booth, try to put together oversized 3D and 2D puzzles, show off with a 10’ dance pole, and experience the Cool Massage with a new and advanced sensual massager. Come for a private intimate portrait session in Bare Naked Tramps Portrait Studio. Individuals, couples, and groups are all welcome. Relax and enjoy great company in the exquisitely decorated Marshmallow Lounge. There will be libations for your pleasure and theme nights get dressed up for such a James Bond 007 party. Check other listings as we also offer daily classes and events.

1211.title: Love, Sex, Food, Death – in Community!
1211.print_description: Question presents Love, Sex, Food, & Death. Leave your preconceptions at home as we explore what makes a community truly sustainable.
1211.desc: Question presents Love, Sex, Food, & Death. Leave your preconceptions at home as we explore what makes a community truly sustainable.

1212.desc:
<< The Temple >>

We are each a temple [literally "place cut off," from stem of “tem” — to cut].  Inside each temple are housed experiences that are the basis of how we comprehend ourselves.  The temple that we are is an adventure.  In that adventure we are swimming through contradictions, polarity, wonder, desires, embarrassments; our emotions, feelings, curiosities, wounds, traumas.

In the temple, what develops is the movement of the psyche. Maibel and Anthony serve as psychopomp guides through the temple with different exercises, taking participants on a trip that expands comprehension of their human complexity, our connection to each other, the need to explore the conversations that we never had. 
　
　
<< The Temple — Nuptias >>

Can partners be more free together than apart?  A new comprehension of polyamory and exclusivity: the Hermetic Relationship.  C/O*
　
　
<< Your psychopomps >>

We—Anthony and Maibel—live the experience of returning to themselves through each other. We enjoy practices that stimulate these experiences that make us more vulnerable, more naked, more pure, more devoted.

We moderate a Facebook group called The Temple exploring the unknown, the unheard, the unsaid — and union. And another called Colony where we encourage conscious, smart, and progressive social nudism and sexuality.
1212.title: The Temple — Nuptias [clothing optional]
1212.print_description: Can partners be more free together than apart?  A new comprehension of polyamory and exclusivity: the Hermetic Relationship.

1213.title: Body Love Gallery
1213.print_description: Creates a safe container in which to navigate feelings surrounding body image, shame, & love. An intimate look into our own embodied experience.
1213.desc: From the moment we are born our society wants to clothe us. Many of us are left feeling vulnerable at the thought of our own nakedness, afraid to bare all. Through group grounding exercises and facilitated conversations, we will create a safe container in which to navigate feelings surrounding body image, body shame, and body love. Moving into small-groups, we will each have an opportunity to exhibit ourselves and tell our ‘museum visitors’ about our bodies, giving an intimate look into our own embodied experience. *Participation requires comfort around nudity.*

1214.desc:
Medieval Germany is known for the stories collected by Brothers Grimm, the Hanse trading company, people obeying to the rules of their kings, and
Gutenbergs art of printing. All of these attributes are reflected in the G.E.R.M.A.N. guild workshop. This workshop is about rule making and printing. Following a playful structure, a personal rule of life and/or behavior is told and traded for a new rule, which is chosen or created by chance. To make this new rule a temporary or permanent part of the participants life, he or she can print this rule on pieces of old German files, badges, wristbands or even body parts.
1214.title: Rule trading, making and printing
1214.location: Grand Elaborated Rule Masters And No-holds-barrers (G.E.R.M.A.N.)
1214.print_description: It's time to give and receive guidance for your life. Let fate (and our shiny judge) decide, and create yourself a personal permanent reminder.

1220.desc:
Contact Improvisation is a meditative dance technique in which participants use points of physical contact to provide the starting point for exploration through movement. This contact can actually induce the production of a pair bonding hormone, called oxytocin, in the human brain, similar to how you feel when you hug or kiss a loved one. 

Through the sensation of touch and dance, you can explore organic movement generated through and with, one-another, forming new bonds and strengthening old ones.

Accompanied by a variety of musicians, this session will begin with some simple guiding prompts to help individuals become familiar with touching as well as giving/receiving weight. As the jam progresses individuals get to explore movement by listening and responding to their partner/partners through touch. There are no right or wrong answers and you do not need prior dance training to participate. 

The central characteristic of Contact Improvisation is a focus on bodily awareness and physical reflexes rather than consciously controlled movements.  Much like meditation, Contact Improvisational Dance seeks to honor the present moment by guiding the dancers to surrender what is happening now. 

“One learns to recognize and differentiate subtle impulses in our movement choices and our partner's choices. We begin to decipher the cues that we give and receive which tell us when to lead or follow, when to go up, when to go down, where to touch, how to lift, when to slow down, and when to be still. In this form one learns to stay in integrity with each choice, never forcing, never rushing. When Body, Mind, and Spirit are united in their instinctive wisdom one finds ones-self at home in every moment expressing ones true nature.”     

- Moti Zemelman
1220.title: Contact Improv : A Meditative Dance Technique
1220.print_description: Through the sensation of touch and dance, we explore organic movement generated through and with, one-another.

1228.desc: Come join us as we consciously enter into the moment to moment dance of life. In this Dancing Freedom journey YOU will be invited to explore the unique, dynamic, and interdependent qualities of each of the 5 elements. As we invoke these primordial forces, they awaken the dreamer within who can assist us to create a deeper relationship to our Selves, others, and our environment. Expect deep soul-filled bass, tribal beats, and a range of intuitively chosen music to guide you on our dance journey. Inspired by her experiences on dance floors around the globe, Hikari-jin has devoted her life to exploring what it means to use movement and ceremony for healing and transformation. In facilitating her own evolution and that of others she is assisting the global shift that is upon us.

1240.desc: Numerous cultures have found communion and solace in the experience of drinking tea. Brewing tea assumes a meditative posture and is inherently generous. Rooted in these philosophies, we will bring strangers together through a tea ceremony grounded in calmness and mindfulness. The significance and ritual of each ceremony will be explained by our in-house tea-master. We will teach participants, in pairs, how to brew tea and conduct a formal tea ceremony specific to an individual culture (Chinese, Indian, Japanese, Russian, African, English, Turkish), which they will then perform and share with the rest of the group.

1272.desc:
What if true happiness and self-esteem come from knowing you can count on yourself to keep a promise to yourself? That making and keeping promises to yourself about what matters most to you, matters most. From eating kale (the state bird of California) to having consistent (and great) sex with your mate to exercising to writing.

It does.

It’s time to get your head out of the game! 
It certainly is not on your dream’s team. We can help.

Anyone who knows it can improve efficiency and reduce errors in relaying important information. Participants in this workshop will receive a reference post card courtesy of camp Zerodrome.

Per la prima volta lo spaghettigeddon  atterra al burning  man! Tonnellate di pasta invaderanno il vostro pianeta, tenetevi pronti per l'apocalisse del gusto. ATTENZIONE! La zona verrà contaminata da olio extra vergine, aglio e peperoncino!
 "Evviva!  Spaghettigeddon lands in the dHive bar at  Burning Man for the first time, bringing tons of pasta cooked directly from a handful of alien chefs from PLANET AGLIO!  Get ready for an apocalypse of Renaissance tastes impossible to define.  Warning!  Abuse of extra virgin olive oil, garlic, and onion will put you into orbit! 
We Italibees are ready to engage any citizen of BRC with our jokes—because of our incomprehensible English be ready for a lot of hand gesturing communication while we vaporize you with flourishing flavor!!! Our mid-day lunch served to you may or may not include the following:

Bring your own eating utensil, we will provide paper plates.  Find us at the dHive bar/BuzzInn in our village ‘Do More Now’ near the 7 story firehouse on 7:30 & B!

1282.desc:
Many of us come from cultures where physical touch and speaking openly is discouraged. Even in the swirling world of self-expression that is Burning Man, people can easily miss simple human contact. Our camp wants to see each individual spirit, to hear each story and to offer moments of real connection. We plan to offer: 
●	60 seconds or more of Intentional Gazing. 
●	Five Minutes or more of Focused Listening. 
●	Generous Hugs - just as long as each visitor wants. 
from 1 to 5 PM, Mon through Fri. (or pretty much any time we’re in our big round public living room). We want to empower and encourage our campers and visitors to continually offer these same three tokens of human contact through out BlackRock City and on our travels all over the world. 
We will have paints and card stock so anyone who wants one has a chance to paint their own sign to offer hugs, gazing and listening. 
We'll have other spontaneous events so check our sign! Relax with us! Have some Water!
1282.title: Intentional Gazing Focused Listening Generous Hugs
1282.print_description: We will see your spirit, hear your story & offer you real connection & will help you offer Gazing, Listening & Hugs to your whole world! Water, too!

1284.desc:
Get your Sexploration on! It’s time to get hot and sexy with other fabulous gender queer, trans, and queer folks!

This party is a safe space for trans, gender queer, gender variant, queer, open minded, unidentified folks to get their freak on. Sexy, hot, & off the hook. We practice safer sex and in order to play you must also. This party is designed with queer folks in mind. It is specifically a safe space for gender blenders, gender benders, trans, and gender questioning folks. It also is a safe space for cisgender queer folks. Feel free to bring toys, condoms, gloves, lube, and cute people - of course we will also be providing. 
Consent in our GenderBlender dome is a must. Keep it safe, sane, and consensual. We take our consent and safety seriously, if you are not interested in fun safe play, don't show up. If you can't play safely then you can't play in our dome. 
If you are ready for an amazing fabulous glittery kickin play party then this is the spot for you! All levels of play are welcome from first timers to sexperts. Respect in our dome is paramount. We are creating a unique space that is not found anywhere else on playa. 
This party is for people of all genders with a priority on creating safety for communities that are normally marginalized or exoticized. We can't wait to see your hotness shine at this phenomenal event.

All genders welcome all ways.

1287.title: The Orgasamator Experience
1287.print_description: The Orgasamator offers intense physical pleasure in an environment that's safe, comfortable, sensual & private.  Exit refreshed & smiling.
1287.desc: The legendary Orgasmatron first came to the playa in 2002, and it provided exceptional physical pleasure to thousands of women in an environment that was safe, comfortable, sensual and private. Five years ago we completely redesigned the machine for even greater intensity and enjoyment, and gave it a new name: The Orgasamator. When you visit, you will be in a private room with an operator who is experienced, very sensitive to your needs and concerns, who listens well and is deeply dedicated to giving you an amazing experience. Your specific needs and desires will be discussed at the beginning, and the experience will be fine-tuned to give you exactly what you want. No penetration is involved, but sexy talk and sensual touch are available options. We want everyone to feel refreshed and respected when they leave. We are strongly focused on cleanliness and health, along with fun. Come solo, or bring a good friend (male or female) to add another dimension to this deeply immersive and wonderfully personal experience. Wear as much or as little as you would like, you can stop any time if the pleasure becomes too intense. If you are a woman, 18+, the Orgasamator Experience is something you won't want to miss. Lines are shortest early in the week, and early in the day.

1289.title: Tribal Tantra w/Eugene Hedlund @ RhythmWave
1289.print_description: Dance in the cultivated energy of the tribe. A wave to ground the gifts, release the layers, and make space to love and be loved. All are welcome.
1289.desc: We will warm up with Movement Meditation to arrive in our bodies and listen to the wisdom within. As we dance, we will awaken the elemental spirits within our physical bodies as we invite that sacred tremor which frees our hearts to love to move us so that we may release that which has held us back and shed any limiting beliefs so that we may invite new gifts and possibilities into the empty space within. By embodying this ritual, we attune our body to tend toward our highest good while making space to step with clarity into what is next. Then we will offer the healing practice of Medicine Dance to melt some of the walls to giving and receiving that love within. From that place, we will dance in the cultivated energy of the tribe - a full wave to ground all the gifts, shake loose any layers ready to release and make even more space to be empowered to our birth right to love and be loved, starting with the Self.

1297.title: Burning Man Ultramarathon
1297.print_description:
Come & run 50k (31 miles) around the playa for the funnest running ever!

Register on Mon if possible. Bring a gallon of water & snack to share!
1297.desc:
What: The Seventh Annual Burning Man Ultramarathon.

How: Pull on your running sneakers, grab a bottle of water or hydration pack, your favorite energy snacks, and hit the playa for one of the most unique and insane 50ks out there. Wear whatever you love best while running – whether that’s a tutu, sports bra and tights, or nothing at all.

Where: Black Rock City (Nevada – exact location info here)

When: Tuesday, August 30th, 2016, 5 a.m.

Who: You! Burners and ultrarunners of all types!

Why: Because it’s fun. Because it’s insane. Because it’s the ultimate high. Because you want to challenge yourself. Because we are working on really rad finishers’ presents! Because the race is a party! Because you don’t mind people chasing after you with bottles of whiskey while you run!

What else: Pink Lightning Camp will be the race headquarters, start, finish, and aid station. Stop by to view the big map, results, ask questions, use our foam rollers and running sticks, or just hang out with some friendly folks. During the race, we’ll have cocktails, fun, music, and lots of cheering. Have your friends come to the healthiest party on the playa! Come on by to volunteer, hang out, pace, or run!

Mingling together old and new spiritual practices, SHUL aims to create a Shabbat service that is accessible, embodied, and fervent. 1394.desc:
Hi everyone, come and get PLASTERED! ;o)

We humbly invite you all to “Becoming the Master/Mistress of Stones: The Arts of Buon Fresco!”

Welcome to the Burning Man Guild Workshops! For the first time ever, Burning Man is hosting a series of workshops in a Florentine piazza-style format to have Masters of various craftsmanship skills teach our students the arts of the Renaissance. 

We, The Three Faced (Stone) Wench Workshop/Guild, are offering a series of classes you would love to attend! 

Here’s the scoop:

Apprentices will learn the various actual old time techniques over several days to create a fresco (block) from scratch to take home. As part of our commitment to up-cycle, we will utilize and recycle actual (old foam insulation) building materials. Participants will learn to recreate various historical stone mixtures that compromise the the surfaces of the block, complete with plastering, cartooning, and finally the stages of painting the actual fresco with pigments. This artifact creation will be followed by (and applied) techniques to 'age' their artwork with the patina and craquelure of passing time. The result? A beautiful, yet portable and tangible, aged piece of buon fresco that becomes their momento of inspired learning at Burning Man. ;)

Upon completing your fresco block, you will receive a Playa Plastered Master of Arts certificate, authorizing you to be plastered anywhere on the playa!

That’s not all! 

We are offering a unique community project/event, and we invite everyone to participate with your hearts (and energy): 

We are accomplishing a recreation of Gustav Klimt’s Beethoven Frieze (Ode To Joy), with a slight twist on the theme: “All You Need Is Love.” The secco fresco artwork will stretch across several large panels, a moving tribute of the people lost at Orlando, Florida, and of our experiences at Burning Man. 

Please join us! ;o)

Youth ages 12 and up welcome.
1394.title: All You Need Is Love
1394.print_description: A community project to create a secco fresco artwork stretching across several large panels, a moving tribute of the people lost at Orlando, Florida.

1409.desc:
We invite participants - especially folks wearing wings, and friends - to gather at the temple on the Sunday of Temple Burn in the hour before dawn (around 5:30-6 AM), to circle the temple in solemn procession as the sun rises around 6:30 AM.  Let's aim for ~15-20 minutes of procession, followed by any additional participation with the Temple you choose. Afterwards we will scatter to share the spirit & purpose of this year's temple.

In perihelion to this event, some of us winged folk will gather again for a night-time circling of the temple, at midnight after the temple burn, around the ashes of the Temple.

Note: The Temple Guardians enthusiastically anticipate this participation, and only ask that we be prepared for them to begin the soft-close of the temple around dawn on Sunday, followed by the firm closure by 8 AM. Parking bikes >500' away from the Temple is requested if you want to stay in the area past 8 AM.

1412.desc:
“Everything in the world is about sex except sex. Sex is about power.”
Oscar Wilde's words have great explanatory and predictive power, but I'm curious about the limits of this model. 
Where & how does Love come in?
Could True Love honor our drives for power and sex by holding them sacred and taking them with us to the next level? Come explore these themes:
    -How does power & sexuality constrain or inspire intimacy?
    -What's the relationship between fear, control & sex
    -Influence & immortality -the ultimate power
    -Can a conscious partnership creatively co-op our need for control?
    -Could True Love offer a map through the power struggle?
    -Why we fuck? Why we fuck off?
Join us for a edgy exploration of how these important ideas intersect. Bring your taboo questions & leave all assumptions at the door.
1412.title: True Love: Beyond Power, Status & Sexuality
1412.print_description: Could True Love honor power & sex by holding these native drives sacred while including them in our developmental ascent? Join this edgy talk.

1415.title: Feldenkrais— Opening your Heart
1415.print_description: We will begin this class with a heart opening meditation followed by a Feldenkrais lesson. Please bring a yoga mat
1415.desc:
At the seat of our souls, core to all of our ambition and desire lies our heart. The heart is the center of our love, compassion, forgiveness and inner peace.
 
 We will begin this class with a heart opening meditation followed by a Feldenkrais lesson that will help us to open our hearts and connect more deeply with our bodies.
 
 The Feldenkrais method emphasizes the connection between the mind, body, and spirit. Though gentle, relaxing, non-impactful movement sequences along with inspirational meditation, you will leave the day standing straighter and taller and with your shoulders falling back behind your chest, hence allowing you to lead with your heart as you walk forward into the world.
 
 Think of Feldenkrais as meditation with movement! 
 
 If you are experiencing any pain, you might find it improve or resolve throughout the class. Feldenkrais helps with the realignment of our bones, muscles and joints and with the coordination of our overall movement patterns.
 
 As we radiate more love out into the world, the world can’t help but smile back. And with that, only magical shifts can follow.

1423.desc:
Guild Workshops Masquerade Procession & Grand Opening

All are invited to the Grand Opening of the Guild Workshops in the piazza at the Man Base! Join us as we celebrate the confluence of artists, makers, tinkerers, and craftspeople from across the world! Among these modern day maker spaces conceived in the spirit of the Renaissance you’ll find glassblowers, blacksmiths, dreamers, chainsaw-wielding portrait makers, musicians and engineers all beckoning your hands on participation in their craft!

The festivities will kick off with a costumed masquerade procession starting at 5:45pm at the Everywhere/Artery Pavilion (6:15 and Esplanade) and leading into the Guild Workshops at the Man Base, where our Guild Workshops Celebration will begin at 6:30 pm. Please don your Renaissance-inspired finery or just come as your creative self!

1428.desc:
Dan Savage says “oral is standard; any model that doesn’t include it should be returned to the factory”.  But what if you like the model?  Mostly.  Just that this one feature needs enhancement?  Or what if oral just never seems to be part of the picture?

Let’s change that situation!

Men, there are things YOU can do to:

•	Help your partner be more comfortable going down on you.
•	Help your partner be more WILLING to go down on you
•	Help your partner learn how to pleasure you better.

Come learn tips to increase the likelihood of your getting the oral sex you fantasize.

And, women, if you’d like to be more comfortable going down on your partner - or if you have a pet peeve that you’d like to share so men know to NEVER do that thing you hate -  come join the discussion.  Here’s a chance to ask question and share feedback.

This is a discussion-only event.  No live demos.  Singles welcome. Ages 21 and up, with ID.

1440.desc:
The Zendo Project provides a supportive environment and specialized care designed to transform difficult psychedelic experiences into valuable learning opportunities, and even potentially offer healing and growth. In turn, our work reduces the number of drug-related hospitalizations and arrests.
 
This year, millions of people will use psychedelics outside of supervised medical contexts, many of them for the first time. Difficult psychedelic experiences can be frightening, but also potentially among the most valuable experiences someone can have. What can you do to help someone having a difficult psychedelic experience? What techniques are available for helping transform a potentially traumatic situation into a positive or even therapeutic one? What role has the Zendo Project played at festivals, and what take-home messages are available for others interested in psychedelic harm reduction?
1440.title: The Zendo Project Workshop
1440.print_description: What can you do to help someone having a difficult psychedelic experience? Learn the principles of Psychedelic Harm Reduction.

1441.title: The Dream Society Aster)*( Dome
1441.print_description: Your tranquil home to relax, journey and dream about our shared society to the sound of curated poetry, philosophy, storytelling, readings and dreams
1441.desc:
We Dream Together
We are all dreamers, there is no other
We share a dream that spans space and time.
We ignite the dreamer within us, lighting up new ideas. 
We connect hearts, bodies, minds with our passionate pursuits, mobilizing movements with our community.

Dreamers do because we love.
The Dream Society creates the experience of the shared dream, seeding inspirations for each other. We share joyfully.
We care for ourselves and reach out to each other in this ongoing process of self-tuning and collaborative alignment. We hone each other by being honest with each other, seeking to be our best by reflecting the best in each other.
Our space is dedicated to collaborative dreaming. In this society, our shared dreams create reality.

We begin by transmitting open space for exploration.
Through play, song, poetry, light, art, science and discovery we explore timeless wisdom, rhythm and the beat of a shared signal.
We create nourishment for each other and experiment with tools for wellbeing to enhance our abilities together.
Dreamspace happens when we come together and share passions. The society we share is decentralized, open and available to participation. Our place is open as sanctuary to lucid dreamers and explorers from all walks.
The dream becomes more intricate and real as we weave ourselves together in vast experiences, a dreamcatcher mandala of jeweled moments tied together through our people.
Our shared dream becomes a sparkling dance of culture creation, improvising to flow with the surreal systems around us to create the world we want to live in.

Our dreamspace is open to share.
We invite you to relax and dive deep within the Dream Society to amplify and transmit your vision with others.
Dance, create, flow, love and be yourself in the shared dance of culture creation. In this play we become both the dreamers and the dream of who we want to be, in this world, together.

1442.desc:
Men, be brave and responsible. Be desired. Being sterile is the new sexy and it won't diminish your maleness or performance in any way. Getting snipped will make you more desirable. Hear what the procedure is like, what happens after, and hear from women admire men who take responsibility for the ultimate birth control procedure. 

Humans are the source cause and the planet cannot sustain us if we continue to overpopulate. No longer should women suffer so much of the birth control responsibility. It is time for men to step up and snip it.
1442.title: To Snip is Sexy
1442.print_description: It's time to lift the birth control burden from women. Learn how sexy and liberating it can be when men disappear their sperm burden.

1475.title: Expansion of Love through Human Connection
1475.print_description: Use the power of platonic (non-sexual) touch to transmute sexual energy into spiritual power – Pure Love.
1475.desc:
Use the power of platonic (non-sexual) touch to transmute sexual energy into spiritual power – Pure Love.

"When yin and yang (or masculine and feminine) come together, it produces energy. Often, that energy is sexually directed. Combustion happens, but usually from the loins. This is part of our “animal / darwinian” nature. Nothing wrong with it per se – it is part of who we are. It is how the human race continues. 
 
 And, we are more.
 
 This powerful energy can also be directed up and through the heart. And when it is, that force of energy has the power to soften the heart and break through walls we may have built up around it (fear, resentment, grudges, and other things that keep us from feeling our own Divinity). If the heart is open and cleansed, energy can move into that space. When it does, it creates a pleasure that makes sex seem rather mundane. The energy gets transmuted into spiritual power and ecstasy – Pure Love.
 
 In this workshop, we will use the power of yin and yang, platonic (non-sexual) touch and loving friendship to soften, expand and ignite the heart with Pure Love.
 
 Using the Light of our eyes and the Energy that moves through our hands and hearts we will connect with each other, swim in Love and glorify the Divinity within our hearts."

1498.desc:
Come try some basic structures to vocal improvisation, explore your creativity through music, build confidence with your voice, and co-create original songs. Using movement and the body as our starting point, we will jam, make sounds, and create music as a group. This work has been incredibly fun, healing, and musically enriching for me and I'm thrilled to be sharing it.

About Natasha:

I'm a musician, facilitator and social artist who works within the Creative Communities Model. I've studied with vocal improvisors Rhiannon (Hilo, Hawaii) and Bisia Belina (Victoria, BC) and give workshops in my home community of Yellowknife, NT, Canada.

A circle is round and has no end.
That's how long I want to be your friend.

1524.desc:
Liberating Ourselves from Patriarchy, Racism, and Heteronormativity in our Relationships On and Off Playa -
Come! Dive into how oppression affects your most intimate and interpersonal dynamics as well as the fantasies running through your own head. This will be a safer space to explore how oppression plays out in your relationships and in your own desires. You will gain tips and tools for how to liberate your mind and how to creatively and sexily shift cultural narratives that don't serve you. This workshop is for people of all backgrounds and genders from kinksters to vanillas, sexperts to just beginning to explore, queer to straight, poly folks to monogamous folks, partnered to single, and all that's in between - everyone is welcome!

1552.desc:
Join us in the Green Goddess Lounge on Wednesday afternoon, where we will offer fellow burners the opportunity to learn more about eating well and staying nourished on the playa.  Learn about the benefits of probiotic foods, including how to make them for yourself at home!
        The Green Goddess resident Nutritionist/Registered Dietitian, Sunsoul; will talk about the benefits of incorporating probiotic foods and beverages (like those we serve) on the playa and into your everyday diet, along with answering questions from fellow campers.
        During class, participants will also have the chance to talk with professional medicinal horticulturists -who will share tips for making your own probiotic foods and drinks at home.

1569.title: Bridges to Another Life
1569.print_description: Reconciling the demands faced by businesses and communities enables us to disseminate cultures appropriate to current conditions.
1569.desc:
"Exponentially accelerating technology, population and development imply that the vast majority of all technological progress has occurred within living memory, yet the basic template for industrial civilization hasn't changed much since Hiroshima.  Merely tacking organic food and  iPhone apps onto the suburban consumerism of the fifties sells both humanity and technology short.  Rather than leaping into the unknown however, or embracing an interested vision, most people rightly stock with what they know, even as it ceases to inspire, or even to make sense.  

Experimental communities can showcase the possibilities technology and abundance have made available, preparing the disaffected to make a shift from consumerism to more advanced forms of society. "

1598.desc:
* Cartooning is a powerful art-form that can entertain and influence, but is simple to learn and accessible to all.  Rock painting is a fun, relaxing, and enjoyable pastime. Wed, Sat: 2-4PM.
Come learn from a professional cartoonist to practice this expressive and enjoyable skill.  All skill levels welcome; you do not need to have any prior training or experience.  Learn all the basic skills like character creation, layout, composition, perspective, and comedy writing.  Brush up on advanced techniques like human and animal figure drawing, proportion, and color.  We end with an improvisational art game using the cartooning skills we've learned.  Supplies provided, or bring your own.
* Forged out of the eons of Deep Time and raw forces of Nature, a uniquely shaped and smoothed river stone awaits your unique curiosity in an ephemeral moment of creative exploration. We supply you with the stone, paint and guidance; you supply your awareness, vision, and imagination. Together on your planetary journeys, after 4.5 billion years you and the river stone meet. Silly or profound, the colors or imagery are all a part of the play on the Playa. Will your rock become a bug, a power object, a flower, or a psychedelic paisley? Experienced art teachers can help with color mixing, brush technique, and concept execution. Create a memory to keep or offer as a gift. Thurs: 3-5PM.
1598.title: Cartooning & Rock Painting: 2 Ways to Rock Worlds

Our version of the popular Jenga game. Only our version is a little more fun & naughty. 

Our 4ft tall large scale Jenga game consists of 54 precision-crafted, specially finished hard wood blocks with special adult call to action instruction on each.. 1673.title: FOMO: Impacting decision making for centuries.
1673.print_description: Come explore how the fear of missing out (FOMO) and how it manifests in cognitive psychology, investment decisions, and personal relationships.
1673.desc:
"The fear of missing out (FOMO) is a new name for a concept deeply embedded in human nature: that by choosing to do something we're going to miss out on something else that is even better.  In cognitive psychology FOMO is known as loss aversion.  Loss aversion refers to people's tendency to strongly prefer avoiding losses to acquiring gains. Most studies suggest that losses are twice as powerful, psychologically, as gains.  Basically FOMO is the losing out on what others are currently experiencing and valuing it higher than the gain of your current experience.  An early example of FOMO comes from Tulipmania in Holland in the 1590s.  Seeing and hearing others buy into the promises of tulip profitability encouraged others to do the same. Nobody wanted to be the one missing out. 

When you lose something it hurts and often to avoid this negative emotion strange behavior may occur. This talk will give insight into why FOMO occurs and illustrate that it happens not only to Millennials anxious about what experiences their peers are having, but also to those making business and investment decisions.

1723.title: Lifestyle Perfected Passion Experience
1723.print_description: Passion is not something we have, it's who we are. Learn how to balance your life and spend the majority of your time living in your passions
1723.desc:
"In this fun and enlivening workshop, you will learn a new context for passion and how to consistently live in a passionate state. Imagine living your life where you are spending the majority of your time doing what you love? Feeling alive and excited about waking up in the morning to experience the day. What would that be like for you? 

Through this workshop you will create a step by step process to:
Understand a new context for passion
Get a clear picture of your passions and what you love to do
Create the steps and room in your life to do things you are passionate about

1766.desc:
We are a group of artisans who travel incognito while instructing others in the fine art of making masks, anatomy illustration, & other indulgences. We have our own metal stamp label that we use to "mark" our handiwork.Our masks are the finest in the region & our artists have the flare of Leonardo.

In the spirit of Carnivale, our menagerie started creating masks & providing instruction on how to create them. As our group increased, so did our artisan base to include painters & sketch artists. We plan to have classes in making & decorating masks along with art classes in anatomy & anything inspiring to those attending.We will have live models to help with inspiration.We will have a plexiglas panel for instruction and colouring.

Art classes will be held daily ranging from anatomy to landscapes, with live models or use of the plexiglas wall as a template.

The Plexiglas wall will be available at all times with markers to color on one side while the design is created on the other.A participant can take a picture of the creation to later print and add to their coloring book.


Our Artisan Menagerie is thrilled to provide the joy of creative expression mixed with various mediums from plexiglas to foam to paper.
1766.title: Renoardo's Artisan Menagerie
1766.print_description: We are a group of artisans who travel incognito while instructing others in the fine art of making masks, anatomy illustration, & other indulgences.

Burning Man Arts & Civic Engagement, The Regional Network, Burners Without Borders and Black Rock Solar invite you to join us for our annual celebration at the new space for Everywhere and the ARTery, as we kick off what promises to be an amazing week on the playa. 1779.title: The Zendo Project for Psychedelic Harm Reduction
1779.print_description: Compassionate Care and a Safe Space for Overwhelming Situations
1779.desc:
Not the kind of fun freaky night you imagined? Things getting a little too weird ...even for Burning Man? The Zendo Project is a place where you can find support during particularly challenging or overwhelming experiences, substance related or otherwise. The Zendo is staffed 24/7 with trained volunteers who offer peer-to-peer counseling support. This is a safe space to land and reconnect with yourself before you head off to your next adventure! We have two locations on D at the 9:00 and 3:00 keyholes. We are open all week, from 8pm on Monday the 29th until 8am on Monday the 5th. If you or a friend are in need of support, come find the Zendo!

Mission
The mission of the Zendo Project is to provide a supportive environment and education to help transform difficult psychedelic and psychological experiences into opportunities for learning and growth.
 
Vision
We envision a world where communities are engaged in providing safety and support for people having psychedelic and psychological challenges; and harm reduction principles are used foremost to reduce the risks associated with substance use.

1786.desc:
"In this deeply transformational, interactive workshop, Jackie and Justin will be sharing the key principles and practices you will need to master to start living fully in the flow and experience how effortless, abundant and free your life can become.  People who master the art of living in flow often feel as if the universe is conspiring in their favor as everything they want and need to be successful, grow and live a truly extraordinary life begins to come to them effortlessly and in perfect synchronicity.  Once you have experienced it, there is no other way to live.

Expect to walk away having integrated a deep understanding of:

+ What the flow is and how to identify the choices and actions which will you bring into alignment with it
+ How to create exponential success and growth in your life and business from a place of effortlessness and flow
+ Techniques for accessing and getting in touch with your intuition and inner wisdom for crystal clear guidance on which path will be the most effortless and fulfilling for you
+ How to let go of struggle, suffering and the fear of surrendering control to the wisdom of life and move into a profound place of trust
+ Simple but powerful practices to be able to call in whatever support and resources you need to further your journey of expansion, personal and spiritual growth and be successful living your passion and giving your gifts to the world"
1786.title: The Art of Flow: The Key to Effortless Living
1786.print_description: Discover powerful practices for bringing your life deeply into the flow and creating exponential growth and success from a place of effortlessness.

1800.desc: Make it Good. VisudhaBuddha believes that endings can be bittersweet, and the way HOME, is to make it Good. Your week on the playa has been full & rich, possibly even messy & beautiful, crazy in good or not so good ways. In the 5Rhythms we will find the pulse of the Mother, the beat of your own heart, and the music of your soul meeting in the unity of one Tribe: we remember and breath the rhythm of Life together. Joining in patterns and repetitions—one dance, one motion, one wave of energy—we come home to ourselves, each other, our home on the playa, and the essence of pure love. Leave Black Rock City with love and your family firmly embodied in your heart. Make an ending you will always remember. Please join RhythmWave and Visudha de los Santos as we close the week and our 10 years at Burning Man with a 5Rhythms celebration of movement, reflection, and spirit.

1828.desc:
Singers! If you want to build your voice to something magnificent, then you will need the krackle exercise! 'Tis the blood of a strong voice. 
It is not always the most appealing sound, especially for beginners, but sometimes you need to sound ugly before sounding awesome! 
The krackle is the rubbing together of the vocal chords, which gives you immense breath control, builds range, and give the sound extra resonance and brilliance. The krackle will get your voice anywhere you want it to take you. Once your voice has worked through the krackle, then it is ready to be garnished with other beauties, like breathy and flowy goodness. But for now were krackling it up!
1828.title: The Singer's Secret Weapon: THE KRACKLE

1830.desc: Join us in the Lotus Dome for the daily recitation of Nam Myoho Renge Kyo and morning gongyo (the practice of chanting two chapters from the Lotus Sutra). In the Lotus Sutra, Shakymuni Buddha revealed that every human being can attain enlightenment in their present form. Through chanting Nam Myoho Renge Kyo, one can create a state of unshakable happiness. Buddhism is a practice and everyone is welcome to join. Each day after chanting, together we will study a Buddhist concept, answer questions, and share experiences. Novices, new practitioners, and curious souls welcome.

1857.title: Tantric Vibration - Feeling Gaia's Energy
1857.print_description: Psycho-physical awakening exercises from different traditions to feel out her vibratory field.
1857.desc:
Psycho-physical awakening exercises from different traditions to feel out her vibratory field.

Open yourself to the possibility of living the paradox of being joyfully alive in this tangible realm we live in while at the same time being liberated and awakened in this body.  We as humans are microcosms of this universe, whatever exists in the outer universe also exists within. Feel the vibrations of this tangible Earth we live in knowing that everything is in motion and nothing rests. Tantra is a system so intuitive and natural to human kind that its essence can be seen within all spiritual paths from the Celtic, African, Native American, Sufi, esoteric Christian, Hindu, Sound Healing, Kabbalah, Buddhist, and Taoist wisdom traditions. It is a set of spiritual practices and ritualistic actions that through personal effort and experimentation are designed to direct universal energies of the macrocosm into the practitioner to achieve total liberation from ignorance and suffering. In this workshop we will use a myriad of psycho-physical exercises learned from different traditions for modifying and exploring consciousness. We will feel the energy of the Earth and learn to appreciate this vibratory field we exist in. with Ashleigh Rojas

1858.desc:
We are a group of artisans who travel incognito while instructing others in the fine art of making masks, anatomy illustration, & other indulgences. We have our own metal stamp label that we use to "mark" our handiwork.Our masks are the finest in the region & our artists have the flare of Leonardo.

In the spirit of Carnivale, our menagerie started creating masks & providing instruction on how to create them. As our group increased, so did our artisan base to include painters & sketch artists. We plan to have classes in making & decorating masks along with art classes in anatomy & anything inspiring to those attending.We will have live models to help with inspiration.We will have a plexiglas panel for instruction and colouring.
Masks: There will be masks available to take for coloring with markers,crayons,pencils & decorating when the shop is open.

Adult coloring books:There will be books available to take for coloring along with playa-friendly crayons.While the shop is open other items will be available for coloring.

Art classes will be held daily ranging from anatomy to landscapes, with live models or use of the plexiglas wall as a template.
The Plexiglas wall will be available at all times with markers to color on one side while the design is created on the other.A participant can take a picture of the creation to later print and add to their coloring book.

On Thursday of the event,we plan a masquerade ball to show off the masks & visit other shops. 

We will also have a metal stamp with a press to imprint on medallions or tin cans or the masks. We plan to have 2-3 different designs, one will represent the Reno Region.

Our Artisan Menagerie is thrilled to provide the joy of creative expression mixed with various mediums from plexiglas to foam to paper.
1858.title: Renoardo's Artisan Menagerie
1858.print_description: We are a group of artisans who travel incognito while instructing others in the fine art of making masks, anatomy illustration, & other indulgences.
1858.other_location: Guild Workshop at The Man Base

1859.title: Rise & Shine Salutation Yoga
1859.print_description: Start your day out right by joining us for Sunrise Yoga with Benji! Become one with the sequence of harmony that envelops & awakens earth and body.
1859.desc:
Start your day out right by joining us at Huggzilla for a sunrise yoga session with Benji!

Greet the sun as it warms and nourishes both you and the earth simultaneously. Become one with the sequence of harmony that envelops and awakens both earth and body. Learn to be the generator of your own inner peace through a physical connection to the earth by focusing body and mind.

Enhance your muscular strength and body flexibility, promote and improve respiratory and cardiovascular function, promote recovery from and treatment of addiction, reduce stress, anxiety, depression, and chronic pain, improve sleep patterns, and enhance your overall well-being and quality of life.

It's the NOODLEPOCALYPSE. 

It's cold, filthy, and far from home out there. There may be wolves, or people dressed like wolves, or a screaming metal monster than someone once called a wolf before science happened to it! No matter, what you need is safety, light, and food! We've got yer back!

Get'cher hot, salty, broth and noodles. We'll have 'em till we don't, you'll slurp 'em down till they're gone. And hey-ho-diddley-hey chuckles, they ain't from no styrofoam cup. Come on down to flavor country, and ride the noodle! (No actual rides present at camp, just noodles...please don't try and ride your noodles, that would just be awkward, and probably messy)

AND BEFORE YOU ASK:
No, they're not gluten free, they're frikkin noodles.
No, they're not vegan. Stop asking. We're not that kind of noodle.
There probably won't be any pandas, geese, or other assorted whimsical creatures unless you bring them yourself.

1937.title: Soul Story Circle: Claiming Your Personal Myth
1937.print_description: Explore the mythic landscape that is living in our unconscious through the exploration of the the symbols, archetypes, metaphors.
1937.desc:
If you are a fan of Joseph Campbell, Jean Houston, Clarissa Pikola Estes...this will be right up your alley. 

This is a live storytelling event where together, we explore the mythic landscape that is living in our unconscious. Through the combination of exploring the symbols, archetypes, metaphors that show up in the one of a kind story created in our time together, you are provided context and tools to explore the power and potential of your story and how to use it to access and embody the parts of you that may be lying dormant. People have requested stories that will heal, provide insight about their gifts, and help them access their personal power. 

What to expect from A Soul Story Circle: When we gather in a circle, one person is chosen to receive a story that will serve all. We then go through a process called talking back to the story, where we make sense of the symbols, metaphors, and archytpes that presented and how they apply to our every day lives.

1938.desc: Tim Mooney’s music reflects the emotional colorings of both connection and solitude. A skilled songwriter and guitarist, he knows his way around verses, evoking names like James Taylor and Jeff Tweedy. In true stripped-down folk style, the listener is taken on a musical journey through backroads riddled with leaves of heartbreak, humility, beauty and always love. We all should be grateful to have such a soulful guide.
1938.title: An Evening With Tim Mooney

1970.desc: Black Rock Playa Dust - what's in it? Is it bad for you? How do you clean it up? - Geologist George Davis will give a full explanation of the chemical and mineralogical data from a playa sample inside of BRC in 2010. Find out the good and bad things about playa dust. Ever had trouble cleaning up after the trip to BRC? Learn a great recipe which involves simple household ingredients which removes playa dust once and for all. In addition, it's environmentally friendly and non-toxic. REAL 'Better living through chemistry' with a demo.

No yoga experience is necessary. If you have a mat or a towel, bring it. We will have some extras (but not enough for everyone). Bring some water.

This is open to everyone at Burning Man, not just runners.

The Hawaiian word ho‘oponopono comes from ho‘o ("to make") and pono ("right").

1999.desc: 5Rhythms is an in-bodied, out of your mind dance experience not to be missed. It is a simple yet powerful moving meditation that anyone – of any age, size, or physical ability – can practice. There are no steps to follow, no choreography to learn, no way to do it wrong. The only requirement is a body that is still breathing, a heart that is still beating, and a mind that is still curious!  Please join Mackenzie Amara on the bamboo at RhythmWave - all are welcome!

2011.title: Rule trading, making and printing
2011.location: Grand Elaborated Rule Masters And No-holds-barrers (G.E.R.M.A.N.)
2011.print_description: It's time to give and receive guidance for your life. Let fate (and our shiny judge) decide, and create yourself a personal permanent reminder.
2011.desc:
Medieval Germany is known for the stories collected by Brothers Grimm, the Hanse trading company, people obeying to the rules of their kings, and
Gutenbergs art of printing. All of these attributes are reflected in the G.E.R.M.A.N. guild workshop. This workshop is about rule making and printing. Following a playful structure, a personal rule of life and/or behavior is told and traded for a new rule, which is chosen or created by chance. To make this new rule a temporary or permanent part of the participants life, he or she can print this rule on pieces of old German files, badges, wristbands or even body parts.

2022.desc: We know you want to lay around in our swamp or dance around our fire to some Talking Heads out on the playa this year...and projector + speaker = basically David Byrne live on the playa. Join us for one of the best "rockumentaries" (dumb word) of all time:  "David Byrne walks onto the stage and does a solo "Psycho Killer." Jerry Harrison, Tina Weymouth and Chris Frantz join him for two more songs. The crew is busy, still setting up. Then, three more musicians and two back-up singers join the band. Everybody sings, plays, harmonizes, dances, and runs. They change instruments and clothes. Bryne appears in the Big Suit. The backdrop is often black, but sometimes it displays words, images, or children's drawings. The band cooks for 18 songs, the lyrics are clear, the house rocks. In this concert film, the Talking Heads hardly talk, don't stop, and always make sense." (thanks IMDB!)

2035.desc: What do vampires have in common with durian fruit? How should we decide whether to undergo a radical personal transformation? Learn about the psychology and philosophy of transformative experiences on the playa and beyond with Molly, a psychologist studying social behavior at festivals, and Countess, an anthropologist working on the transformative power of play.

2036.desc: This is your opportunity to contemplate Deep Time while on the playa. Your journey will be led by geology experts Drs. Elizabeth Miller (Stanford U) and John Dilles (Oregon SU).  Bike to the outer playa to contemplate the history of this place we call home, from the deep time geologic framework to the ice ages, first human inhabitants in the region, post-glacial warming and the raw chant and inexorable warming of the Anthropocene era.  Burn baby burn!  P.S. Deep Time = Geologic Time.
2036.title: Experience Deep Time on the Playa Bike Tour:
2036.print_description: Deep Time = Geologic Time. A geology bike tour field trip lead by 2 geologists, Elizabeth Miller (Stanford U) & John Dilles (Oregon SU).

2054.desc:
A Burning man camp that has been operating for the past 4 years - "Flying Falafels"

Flying Falafels is a camp consists mostly of Israeli burners, but brought together burners from several other nations throughout the years. For the past few years we have been putting up a theme camp with a peak event - A Mediterranean Falafel party.

We intend on being involved, participate and to keep contributing to the Burning Man community. 
As the time goes on, we make enormous efforts to make our community grow , during the event and throughout the rest of the year.

Come join us and share with us your experiences from the playa!

This year we have decided to join forces with The Yard to make this event even more extravaganzous.

2065.desc:
Meet at the Man with your red dress, running shoes, a drinking vessel and a sense of humor. We will lay a Hash House Harriers-style trail that you can run, jog, walk, slide, or bike that ends with a cold brews, silly songs and guaranteed debauchery. Don’t run? No problem — bring your bike. Trail will be clearly marked with flags and there will be beverage stops along the way. On-on!
No red dress?  Anything red will do. If you are in need of a red dress, that perfect red accessory or just wanna drink a beer before trail begins – meet us at the BRCH3 Dome of Bad Decisions at 9:15&C @ 1pm for our Red Dress Exchange and Beauty Bar.

Gypsy chef Yana Gilbuena has prepared underground Filipino feasts in five countries and all 50 states. She is now proud to present BRC’s very first Filipino pop-up dinner! Served on a table of fresh banana leaves, enjoy the delicious flavors our lovely chef has dedicated her life to share. 

30 seats available and first come first served. Don’t worry about the dishes either - it’s a traditional Kamayan feast which means you eat with your hands! Smell, touch, taste, and love this one of a kind experience. Mabuhay!

2069.title: Naked Pub Crawl
2069.print_description: 13th annual Naked Bicycle Pub Crawl.  Get naked and meet at the Man.  Multiple host camps standing by.   Afterparty hosted by Comfort & Joy.
2069.desc: Since 2004, hundreds of burners meet at the Man and pedal off into the City for a few hours of bar hopping and good cheer! Multiple host camps will have bartenders standing by with icy libations prepared exclusively for the riders. Among this year’s host camps are Barbie Death Camp & Wine Bistro, Duckpond, Cubhouse, BAAAHS, and Celestial Bodies. The ride culminates with an 80s Jazzercise Dayglo afterparty hosted by the wonderful folks at Comfort & Joy. If you’re willing to meet the dress code, join us for one of the goofiest parties on the playa. No statement or political agenda; just riding our bikes, drinking some cocktails, and making new friends. Oh yeah, and we’re naked. Mugs for the first 500 riders (and yeah, we always run out). Cheers!

2078.desc: Remember that lesson in art class where you made a camera out of an oatmeal box? Pinhole Project invites you to check out our cameras, do an art tour, and make art on the playa!  Each year, we shoot, develop and fix about one hundred photographs on the playa each Burning Man. he Pinhole Project exposes 30 x 40 inch sheets of light sensitive gelatin silver paper. We work with 12 pinhole cameras, created out of 50-gallon cardboard barrels. This size is uniquely suited for capturing the incredible scale and immense diversity of art and culture at Black Rock City. Under the red safelights of the darkroom, photosensitive paper is inserted into the camera body. Exposures range from 40 to 300 seconds, where concentrated beams of sunlight are funnelled through the pinhole and into the camera, creating a negative image of the recorded subject. We maintain a desert darkroom in a shipping container, where we gather to processes, develop and fix about one hundred photographs each Burning Man. These unique images are then exhibited in Illumination Village, Center Camp Cafe, and off-playa. The pinhole camp has been creating large-scale portraits with festival participants since 1999.
2078.title: Come Make Pinhole Photographs with Pinhole Project
2078.print_description: Check out our pinhole cameras, do an art tour, and make art. Head out for photo fun on the playa with Pinhole Project, we do pinhole photography!

Five years ago we completely redesigned the machine for even greater intensity and enjoyment, and gave it a new name: The Orgasamator. When you visit, you will be in a private room with an operator who is experienced, very sensitive to your needs and concerns, who listens well and is deeply dedicated to giving you an amazing experience. Your specific needs and desires will be discussed at the beginning, and the experience will be fine-tuned to give you exactly what you want. No penetration is involved, but sexy talk and sensual touch are available options. We want everyone to feel refreshed and respected when they leave. We are strongly focused on cleanliness and health, along with fun. Come solo, or bring a good friend (male or female) to add another dimension to this deeply immersive and wonderfully personal experience. Wear as much or as little as you would like, you can stop any time if the pleasure becomes too intense. If you are a woman, 18+, the Orgasamator Experience is something you won't want to miss. 2111.title: Morphic Field Movement
2111.print_description: This practice is not dance, body expression, theater, nor performance — it is a composition of these, and more.
2111.desc:
Movement precedes us, we don’t create movement. This practice is not dance, body expression, theater, nor performance — it is a composition of these, and more. We will use the intelligence of the movement to communicate. 
 
 You can move being encouraged and guided by the intelligence of morphic fields (Rupert Sheldrake has published credible research about this). A morphic field is a field of energy that stores information; in the field exist dynamics, settings, games, processes; it is a memory field, it is an intelligent field. A morphic field is created when any of us introduces an intention and an action in space and time, which after being performed several times becomes a specific intelligence, then that intelligence influences the actions of a whole group and creates a memory of a way of doing things. We can create morphic fields at will, because our intelligence is able to. In a morphic field the communication is easy and instantaneous. What this workshop proposes is the creation of fields of intelligence through movement, because I believe that as human beings we are prepared to communicate with new languages. Art informs certain languages ​​that are developed over time, and perhaps now it's time to take those languages ​​as structures that allow us a different way to function in life.
 
 Morphic Field Movement becomes physical expression, borne from body languages, from the poetry of the body, from the clear expression of the bodies...

2127.title: Tantra Heart Dance and Heart Songs Circle
2127.print_description: Chakra Opening Dance into Bliss followed by Exquisite Heart Opening songs by Swedish Recording Artist Fia
2127.desc:
You are invited to a special pairing of heart opening practices which invite us to allow more love to flow in, around and through us.
 
 First we enjoy a Tantric Chakra opening Dance where we will feel our place between heaven and Earth through sacred embodied expression
 
 Then in the state of connected bliss Fia will lead us in a heart song circle!
 
 Singing together gives us the space to clear out our energetic field, raise our vibrations and let go of what is no longer serving us. Through singing we can develop deep contact with ourselves, it opens the heart and silence the mind. It connects us with each other and is a way of being present in the now. 
 
 About Fia:
 Fia Forsström is a singer-/songwriter from Sweden who creates music with a wish to move something inside of you. Lyrics that reflects all of life; here is the beautiful and wild, but also the ugly and uncomfortable. She is driven by evoking thoughts and to inspire. She has a great passion for the healing power of singing and creating spaces where people can meet each other just as they are. After experiencing the enormous joy and energy of chanting circles, singing together without any focus on achievement and instead let the song come from the heart, she wants to open up and invite more people to share that magic.
 
 https://www.facebook.com/FiasMusic/

2134.desc:
2016 Black Rock City Air Guitar Championship - Esplanade & 6:45

OFFICIAL RULES OF COMPETITION:  
 	Each performance is played to 1 minute (60 sec.) of a song
 	The 60 second song will be provided to you from a list of 100+ tracks to choose from
 	The instrument must be invisible & be a guitar, i.e. air drums not allowed
 	Air roadies are allowed, but must leave the stage before the performance
 	Back-up bands (air or real) are not allowed

Black Rock City Air Guitar contests each consist of two rounds:

 	Round 1 (freestyle): each competitor performs to a song of their choice from the list
 	Round 2 (compulsory): top competitors from round 1 perform surprise song

JUDGING CRITERIA:  
The jury is a panel of independent judges. The results of the jury cannot be protested. All performances are scored on a scale from 4.0 to 6.0 – 6.0 being the highest possible. Scores are given to one decimal point (e.g. 5.4, not 5.48). A single score is given to each air guitarist based on their overall performance in that round.

The score reflects the quality of the performance based on three key criteria:

1.	Technical merit - You don’t have to know what notes you’re playing, but the more your invisible fretwork corresponds to the music that’s playing, the better the performance.
2.	Stage presence - Anyone can do it in the privacy of their bedroom. Few have what it takes to rock a crowd of hundreds or even thousands – all without an instrument.
3.	“Airness” - The last criteria is the most difficult to define yet often the most decisive of all. Airness is defined as the extent to which a performance transcends the imitation of a real guitar and becomes an art form in and of itself.

Please note: the scores from BOTH ROUNDS are added to determine the contestants’ final scores. This combined score determines the winner.  Earn the title of Black Rock City Air Guitar Champion!

2191.title: Elephant Expressions
2191.location: Elephant Expressions/Radical Self-Expression, The Ten Principles of Burning Man
2191.print_description: Radical Self Expression, 10,000 Elephants to decorate, gift, take home and get creative with. Come visit us under the man and Express yourself.
2191.desc:
A ten part, ten year art project based on the Ten Principles of Burning Man.  This year, in name of "Radical Self Expression" we sent out five hundred vinyl toy elephants to kids all over the world and asked them to express themselves by decorating them.  We are then taking those elephants and displaying them at Burning Man under The Man as part of the Guild Workshops piazza.
Our aim is to bring awareness of the importance of creativity in a child's life. Lack of funding has stopped art programs in many public schools across the country. We are figuratively and literally putting the crayon back in the child's hand. We are also bringing 10,000 elephants to the playa this year and letting burners express themselves by decorating the elephants, and gifting them to fellow burners. 
We chose to create a vinyl elephant for the kids to decorate because of the elephant's outstanding memory. We are building positive experiences in children that we want them to remember for a lifetime. 
We also sculpted the elephant into the shape of the Vitruvian Man, as a wink to this year's Burning Man theme.

2197.title: Yellow Submarine Viewing Party and Sing-A-Long!
2197.print_description: Wear your grooviest 1960s duds! It’s a 1968 Yellow Submarine trip with The Beatles thru Pepperland! Refresh while U view and sing. Karaoke bash after!
2197.desc: Do you like to sing? Do you like The Beatles? Step right this way! Roll up for our Mystery Tour! One night only! Wear your grooviest duds that show off your spirit of the 60’s and take a trip in our Yellow Submarine as we gaze upon The Beatles 1968 voyage through Pepperland! Enjoy refreshments while you watch the movie with fellow fans! Harmonize with The Beatles during the movie and attend our after party in our Karaoke sing-a-long! Come for the movie; stay for the vocal jam. - Some years ago on the Playa, we had a total blast when a spontaneous chorus broke out in our camp, covering classic songs, and an annual tradition was born. We’re updating that tradition as we gather this year to sing timeless Beatles tunes with/without accompaniment. Everyone’s invited and welcomed! It ain’t over ’til it’s over!

2198.desc:
Come all you wanderers, take retreat. Make a conscious choice to distance yourself from the forces that rob you of your peace. Retreat is an advance toward your own center. You move toward balance, and thus a much stronger position. Cut yourself free, and answer the call of the open vistas before you.

Please join Amy Vito for this yoga class inspired by the 33rd (Tun/Retreat) & 56th (Lu/Wanderer) hexagrams of the I Ching. Come and be renewed, at RhythmWave.

2200.desc: 5Rhythms is an in-bodied, out of your mind dance experience not to be missed. It is a simple yet powerful moving meditation that anyone – of any age, size, or physical ability – can practice. There are no steps to follow, no choreography to learn, no way to do it wrong. The only requirements are a body that is still breathing, a mind that is still curious, and a heart that is still beating. Please join Mackenzie Amara for this high-vibration, slam-dunk celebration of freedom @ RhythmWave!

2202.desc: Reverbia presents for the first time our Reverbia Interactive Live Music Art Wall Mural!  As our Live Music resonates through your ears, share your depths of perspective and emotion through the iterative expression of Art Wall Painting. Noted Canadian artist Danielle Caners, leads an expedition into the realms of unknown, improvised art, where only through the collective creative mind, can a masterpiece be discovered.  Daily and nightly, when the live music is playing, come share your artistic expression by painting upon our mural canvas wall.  Portions of Reverbia's Art Wall Mural will be painting between established lines, while other areas of the Art Wall Mural will be free formed expression.  *Note that the Reverbia Art Wall Mural will not be open 24 hours…but will operate throughout the day and night whenever our artist supervision  is available.  During Reverbia's concerts in the Shade Series and Reverbia Live Nights…the Art Wall Mural will be the most consistently available for public painting and expression.

2249.title: Voices from the Occupation of the Malheur NWR
2249.print_description: In this talk, Mike Marxen from US Fish and Wildlife Service will discuss the armed occupation of Malheur.  What do public lands mean to you?
2249.desc: The armed occupation of the Malheur National Wildlife Refuge in January 2016 was a significant event in the history of public lands in the west. In this talk Mike Marxen from US Fish and Wildlife Service  will explore words and stories from the occupation that were used to provoke, challenge, resolve and heal. As we gather here and legally "occupy" this desert, what do public lands mean to you?

This ceremony is open to everyone who feels their hearts drawn to it.

2277.title: SCOTCHFEST
2277.print_description: Join for a once-a-year massive tasting featuring over 100 bottles with like-minded fans. Entry requires a bottle of single malt (No blends) Sláinte!
2277.desc: Yo, Mukker!! Still kickin’ y’self for missing last year, eh...? 100 bottles of single malt on the bar and you weren’t there!? Like a nightmare you can’t wake from. Except, you CAN... ‘Cause we’re doin’ it again! That’s right, Scotchfest is back -- your basic confluence of peat, dust, and obsessed freaks like you! The rules are simpler than golf, so pay attention... Bring a bottle of your favorite drop to the Mystikal Misfits bar (4:30 & B) at 2 pm, Wednesday, August 31st. MALT FESTIVAL, jocko – exotic, unique, transcendent -- and we’re looking to learn what YOU like. In return, every other souser presents a bottle of their best game, so make no other plans until 6 pm. Be prepared for Scottish music, savory nibbles, and a superlative group of like-minded Burner scotch freaks! They don’t do this kind of thing where you live, boyo, so mark it down. And remember, it’s an exclusive event -- NO BOTTLE, NO ENTRY. So, if you’re tromping through the desert stour spewing feathers like a twally, know that Lassie or Laddie, skuddy roaster or minted dobber, we’ll be gettin’ belter blootered at the Misfits, mate... If you ain’t geein it yaldy, hell slap it intae ye! And as we’re fond of saying, “A dram good time will be had by all!”
