2280.desc:
Join us for the 2nd annual Black Rock City Beer Mile. 

BYOB and a ziploc in case you puke!

Join us for the 2nd annual Black Rock City Beer Mile!!!!

Drink a beer, run 400 meters, drink a beer, run 400 meters, drink a beer, run 400 meters, drink a beer, run 400 meters.

If you puke, you need to drink a penalty beer.

All participants MUST bring their own beers (a 6 pack is best in case you puke) AND you MUST run with a large ziploc bag (in case you puke, bc Burning Man is a Leave No Trace Event). 

All beer mile rules must be followed:
http://www.beermile.com/rules

Please arrive a few minutes early for registration (yep, numbers this year). Heckling is encouraged. This will be fun. Sometimes, the best beer milers are NOT runners...and sometimes, the best runners are NOT good beer milers. It's fun no matter what!
2280.title: 2nd Annual Black Rock City Beer Mile!!
2280.print_description:
Drink beer, run 400 meters, drink beer, run 400 meters, drink beer, run 400 meters, drink a beer,run 400 meters

BYOB & a ziploc (in case you puke).

2289.print_description: You will be taught the illusion of how to make a levi wand appear to float magically around your body as you dance. Short string wands are provided.
2289.desc: Are you ready to learn a little magic? Explore basic levi wand movements where you will be taught the illusion of how to make a levi wand appear to float magically around your body as you dance. We will first warm up with some basic hand/arm stretching and then move into the different types of hand wrap techniques and balance where you will be taught how to control the levi wand. We will cover stalls, lasso’s and body breaks. Lastly, we will integrate everything we’ve learned into a magical wand dance where you will captivate others with your ability to magically float a levi wand! This will be a short string workshop. Wands will be provided. Welcome to all ages

2298.desc:
Shouldn’t other forms of relationships and partnerships be honored as highly as we honor romantic partnerships? What if Friends could get "Friendgaged"? What if they could commit to each other in ceremony? Wouldn't it be a better world if Friends more often expressed their dedication and love to one another?

Friendlandia is a place to celebrate new and long-time Friendships in a ceremony by sharing vows, exchanging Friendship Bracelets, and expressing love for the non-romantic relationships in your life. Come have a ceremony at our Temple built by Zonotopia creator Rob Bell to celebrate your Friendship and become BFFs--Burner Friends Forever.

2328.desc:
Need an afternoon PICK-ME-UP?                                                                              A little energy before another night on the Playa?


Roasted Breaux & Coffee Heaux Coffee Camp will be open on Monday, Wednesday and Thursday from 1-3 PM. Bring family, friends, lovers and strangers and create your own unique blend from our wide range of International coffees.  You have the opportunity to hand-grind you own unique selection of coffee that will be served pour-over style. Then pull up a chair or a pillow and sit, relax, listen to music and visit with friends, new and old, in our coffee house lounge.

We will be roasting our coffee at various times throughout the week so you won’t find a fresher cup of coffee in BRC. Come in, hang out and if you feel up to it, join in and help us roast our next batch of Roasted Breaux and Coffee Heaux coffee.  

Ask about coming by and roasting your own on-the-playa beans to bring back to the default world (a little playa dust in the mix makes a great brew!) or help us gift a fresh cup of coffee to the burners who are serving the BRC community.

In the LNT (Leave No Trace) spirit, please remember to bring your own cup, or subject yourself to the “Wheel of Misfortune” (cue the sinister music)!!!

2340.desc: Symbiogenesis is the process by which groups of organisms merge into more complex meta-organisms. It is the process that lead to the evolution of complex cells and all macroscopic life. 2356.desc: Samasati means awareness or consciousness. The purpose of this meditation is to bring awareness to the denial and fear people have regarding death. The goal of this meditation is to practice the art of witnessing rather than reaching to situations and circumstances. Be aware and remember that since you are alive, you must not take your life for granted. Choose the position: 'I will always value my life.' Appreciating my life means waking up every morning and looking into the mirror, and saying to myself, 'I am so happy to be alive!' Thank you Osho, for helping me to create this meditation." I designed this meditation so that it can be done in a group or by yourself. The first six stages are an oppertunity to practice dying consciously, a rehearsal for the end of your life. The remaining four stages are a reminder to live totally and cherish each moment.
2356.title: Samasati Meditation
2356.print_description: Bring awareness to the denial and fear regarding death. The art of witnessing rather than reaching to situations and circumstances.

You will first participate in helping other Burning Man friends get washed by spraying them with Water, Dr. Bonners Peppermint Soap, washed with plenty of hands by your Playa neighbors, then sprayed again with water and squeeged off before you depart for more Playa fun. Benji leads you through stretches and movement designed to enhance range and muscle memory of the human body. Learning to literally reach out into the world, let it nourish you and allow you to fulfill your true potential in physicality.

Enhance your muscular strength and body flexibility, promote and improve respiratory and cardiovascular function, promote recovery from and treatment of addiction, reduce stress, anxiety, depression, and chronic pain, improve sleep patterns, and enhance your overall well-being and quality of life.

2391.title: Divine Masculine & Divine Feminine Healing Circle
2391.print_description: Want to HEAL the rift between the Masculine and Feminine? In yourself and in humanity? Men create the outer ring -witnessing. Women are inside -being.
2391.desc:
Want to HEAL the rift between the Masculine and Feminine? In yourself and in humanity? Men create the outer ring - witnessing. Women are inside - receiving. Love transforms all.

'The Divine Masculine and Feminine Healing Circle' is an event where the men of the playa are invited to step into their higher selves, and consciously hold the energy of the Divine Masculine. Josie Posie leads a ceremony where the women of the playa welcome the men lovingly at the entrance to the dome, inviting them to match the high vibration they hold. The dome becomes an Ancient temple space. The men then stand in a circle offering unconditional love and healing to the community of women who gather in the center. The women come for healing their trust of the Masculine and to receive their love. This is a hands-off workshop. There is no touching except optional hugging at the end. 

When men show up and become the pure presence of their Divine Masculine nature and truly witness them, then women can relax into their loving Divine Feminine nature and fully become that love. As both polarities do this, we transmute cultural wounds in the collective feminine and masculine for all of humanity, co-creating a needed and beautiful new balance.

Brave guests are invited to taste our 'burning balls'. Don't miss our daily themed events!

2395.print_description: Learn the history of burn scars on the playa, the anatomy of a fire blanket, then off we go via bike tour to see the world’s largest fire blanket.
2395.desc: Senior Earth Guardian and Leave No Trace Master Educator Mike Bilbo will discuss the history of burn scars on the playa, Leave No Trace solutions, and Burning Man's stewardship through large scale solutions known as burn platforms. Learn also what is the latest protocol for building a fire when camping in back country areas. Then off we go via bike tour to see the world's largest fire blanket. How big is it, what is it made of? We will investigate.

2397.title: Leonardo’s Selfie Booth: The Vitruvian Me!
2397.print_description: Your likeness captured, quickly turned into ink drawings as if by the Maestro, & gifted back to you via jpeg via thumb drive, phone upload, or email
2397.desc:
We of the Guild of Vitruvius, under the protection of Joyism, gift custom renditions of The Vitruvian Man to you.  Imagine your own personage captured in the form of Da Vinci’s Vitruvian Man, arms and legs splayed within the Vitruvian square and circle, rendered as a page from the Maestro’s workbook, and distributable as the ultimate Renaissance jpeg selfie.  Our Guild artisans help you pose while laying on a green screen (with or without clothing), take two pictures, process those pictures, display the final images (one with wings), and encourage you to download it to your camera or thumb drive.  We can also send you an image via email after the event.  Have fun with your images, which are suitable for printing, social media distribution, or decorating your computer, phone or watch.

In short, you haven’t done Burning Man 2016 until you have a picture of yourself as The Vitruvian Me!

2412.desc: 5Rhythms is an in-bodied, out of your mind dance experience not to be missed! It’s a simple yet powerful moving meditation that anyone – of any age, size, or physical ability – can practice. There are no steps to follow, no choreography to learn, no way to do it wrong. The only requirements are a body that is still breathing, a mind that is still curious, and a heart that is still beating. All are invited to join Eugene Hedlund on the bamboo at RhythmWave!

2423.print_description: An exploration through performance, storytelling, and tease, featuring DS performers and guests from the BRC community with ample opportunity for part
2423.desc: Dark Sparkle is the potent mix of the mysterious and the dangerous that makes something irresistibly attractive. It's what pushes people to the point of insanity; that unexplainable quality that pulls people to the dark side. Some days, Dark Sparkle is your alter-ego; other days it is your most natural feeling form. Dark Sparkle is Mona Lisa's smile, biscuits and gravy, the Fonz, the apocalypse. It is an adventurous way of life--physically, emotionally and mentally that citizens of BRC embrace. Our shows are an opportunity for Dark Sparklers and other BRC citizens to explore and showcase their Dark Sparkle through performance, storytelling, and tease. Featuring your favorite DS performers as well as guests from the BRC community. We'll also turn the tables with ample opportunity for participation.

2442.desc: When approached most think I'm a unicorn but is it true? Let's talk about the dating world as a single human being in the non monogamous worlds. From online dating, to play parties, to walking down the street or sitting in your car. Come talk with the like minded and we can help form boundaries, wants, desires, to better help your dating world!
2442.title: "Am I a Unciorn?" Dating in the Non Monogamous
2442.print_description: When approached most think I'm a unicorn but is it true? Let's talk about the dating world as a single human being in the non monogamous worlds.

2443.title: Poly Juice Box
2443.print_description: Think poly is complicated? Try adding children to the mix. Weather you're poly with children, or otherwise in an open relationship with children.
2443.desc: Think poly is complicated enough? Try adding children to the mix. Weather you're poly with children, or otherwise in an open relationship with or contemplating children, this special Poly High Tea discussion is for you. Bring the kids and lets hear from them if you like (or dare)! If all this seems overly daunting, don't worry - it is! So let's put our dusty heads and hearts together and see what we come up with. This is an open discussion facilitated by Peter & Gretchen (aka Adam & Eve) about all things poly with children. This will be their 8th Burn, and the second with their 5 year old daughter, Veronica. Don't expect us to have all the answers, instead come to both learn and teach! Juice boxes and animal crackers provided to help grease the conversation.

2444.desc:
The Rhombohedron Society is about  exploring the world of cubic symmetry. The lesson being taught by the Society is about the unifying properties of the rhombic dodecahedrton. This includes finding and learning about the how the lost triangle of Pythagoras defines the slopes of the faces of cubic polyhedra. 

Within the space are four areas. The primary workshop/classroom includes seating and work tables where visitors will learn about the Lost Triangle and make a Lost Triangle template to take with them. Visitors also will have the opportunity to learn more about geometry by assembling small scale models.

There will be a dome with built in seats and a transparent skin being used for 24/7 multi-media presentations, and the Gypsy Wagon and car “SV 3 Rose” all made in plywood with integral slotted and notched connections, more whimsical creations as if from the mind of Leonardo.
2444.title: Geometrical Constructions
2444.print_description: The Rhombohedron Society invites you to explore the world of cubic symmetry. Learn about the Lost Triangle of Pythagoras and the Rhombic Dodecahedron.

2451.title: KARAOKE and open mic daily at Camp Fuego!
2451.print_description: KARAOKE & OPEN MIC at Camp Fuego. Come sing "Mo Mercy" or "No Mercy" karaoke and win a prize! Organic snow cones and top shelf bar OPEN!
2451.desc: KARAOKE at Camp Fuego, daily Monday through Friday at the 6:00 Plaza @3:15 location.  Serving the best organic snow cones on the Playa.  Play “Mo' Mercy or No Mercy Karaoke". If you to sing Mo' Mercy Karaoke, talented singers stand by on 3 additional mics to jump in and sing the song with you to makes sure the 6:00 Plaza is filled only with the most beautiful sounds of song. Ambitious singers can opt for No Mercy Karaoke, where they sing solo or duet and a panel of judges will either award them a prize for a beautiful song or CUT THEIR MIC and fade back to dance music if anything less. Oh yes, it can get brutal, but it's all love and fun on the playa!

2453.title: How to Save the World in 2 Simple Steps
2453.print_description: The challenges facing humanity can seem unsolvable. Emily Fletcher suggests the solution to these complex problems may be much simpler than we think.
2453.desc: So you have a meditation practice...now what?  The challenges that humankind is facing can seem unsolvable. Problems  like climate change, terrorism and the food crisis. Emily Fletcher suggests that the solution to these complex problems may be much simpler than we think. Meditating twice a day can not only help to optimize your personal performance, it can help to up-level the state of consciousness of innovators and world leaders (read everyone) who are positioned to solve the more complex challenges the world is facing. You may laugh, you may cry but you will definitely leave lit up about leaving the world better than you found it.

2461.title: Countless Carrot March
2461.print_description: JOIN the More Carrot Camp and march on to protect The Man from the Ravenous Bunny Hordes!  Meet @ French Quarter for pre-party and organizing.
2461.desc: JOIN the More Carrot Camp and march on Thursday September 1st to protect The Man from the Ravenous Bunny Hordes! It's time to claim our rights and the rights of all veggie-kind to be treated as the sentient beings we are. All Carrots and Allies assemble in your finest green and orange attire for a pre-party from 4pm-6pm at the 4:30 Portal in the French Quarter before the Billion Bunny March. In true Carrot fashion, we’ll provide drinks, music and much entertainment before we head out to intercept the bunnies at 6pm sharp! Bring along your singing voice and your best vegetable themed cocktails to share. While pro carrot, we're certainly a vegetable-friendly group. Practice your chants, learn some Carrot songs (http://goo.gl/IpyjQ) and, most importantly, join us as our wave of orange and green goodness spreads across the playa!

2462.desc: Earth Guardians presents the art of Bonnie Monteleone which depicts the abundance of plastic debris in some of the most remote regions of the world.  After logging nearly 10,000 nautical miles in 3 ocean gyres, the word is out: " All of us are part of the problem, but we all can be part of the solution".  Learn about Bonnie's amazing journey
2462.title: What Goes Around, Comes Around
2462.print_description: Bonnie Monteleone's art depicts the abundance of plastic in remote areas of the world. Hear about her amazing journey: 10,000 n. miles, 3 gryres.

2463.title: Stardust Chapel: Playa Weddings!
2463.print_description: The Stardust Chapel is the ideal spot for your unique playa wedding!
2463.desc: Welcome to the Chapel of Love at the Stardust Lounge! We will be open daily for drop-in weddings between Monday, 8/29, and Saturday, 9/3. Our hours are noon -- 6pm (sunset) and by appointment. Experience the wonders of our magical gazebo where visitors of all genders can partake of the joy of matrimony in a (non-legally-binding) ritual. Elvis, Drunk Elvis, or Mr. Stardust might serenade you as our beautiful showgirls celebrate your nuptials in Vegas fashion. Not sure what kind of Playa wedding you want? Spin the Wedding Roulette wheel and find out! Need your Playa wedding annulled? We'll do that too! Don't forget to take a commemorative photo in our fabulous "head in hole" wedding cutouts before you leave. Note: please feel free to contact us if you want to schedule a special ceremony outside our "regular" daytime hours. We're here for you!

2476.desc:
Come check out our pinhole camera and play with us, we do pinhole photography! Pinhole Project has brought to the playa twelve very large pinhole cameras created out of 50-gallon cardboard barrels. Join us in our annual pilgrimage to use old school pinhole photography on the playa.

The Pinhole Project exposes 30 x 40 inch sheets of light sensitive gelatin silver paper. We work with 12 pinhole cameras, created out of 50-gallon cardboard barrels. This size is uniquely suited for capturing the incredible scale and immense diversity of art and culture at Black Rock City. Under the red safelights of the darkroom, photosensitive paper is inserted into the camera body. Exposures range from 40 to 300 seconds, where concentrated beams of sunlight are funnelled through the pinhole and into the camera, creating a negative image of the recorded subject. We maintain a desert darkroom in a shipping container, where we gather to processes, develop and fix about one hundred photographs each Burning Man. These unique images are then exhibited in Illumination Village, Center Camp Cafe, and off-playa. The pinhole camp has been creating large-scale portraits with festival participants since 1999.
2476.title: Pinhole Camera Photography with Pinhole Project
2476.print_description: Come play with us, we do pinhole photography on the playa!

What better way than listening to some British guy tell you how much worse his life is vs. yours? That's right, come on over, tell our professional bartender counselors how your doing, and nurse a cocktail with our accommodating campmates! We're here to get that sail set on the right course and send ya back out onto the playa sea!

Throughout the week, WE will organically grow and participants can walk amongst and be inspired by this hanging garden that signifies BRC’s collective, shared wisdom. Some pieces in WE will be written in mirror cursive, a homage to Da Vinci’s notebooks--we will provide pocket mirrors to decipher their meaning.

2518.desc:
Just what is Poly High Tea? - First, it's a Tea Party. We will be serving Tea and Cookies...

All you Polyamorous, poly-curious, and poly-friendly folks out there on the playa are invited to join us for a discussion about the practical issues of loving more than one in an open, responsible multi-person relationship. There are many workable forms of Polyamorous relationship - polyamory is polymorphic! There is much wisdom in the poly community which can be helpful to people trying to make *any* relationship work, monogamous or Polyamorous. There will be a facilitated discussion in which you can get your questions addressed and some of the knowledge in our community can be shared.

If you'd like to cool off and de-dust yourself after our tea party, bring a water donation to enjoy PolyParadise's famous Human Carcass Wash.

"What you look for is what you see? If you look for gratitude, you will surely find it. 
 
 Qoya is based on the idea through movement, we remember. We remember our essence is wise, wild and free. Wise, wild and free also draw reference to the movement forms that we practice. Wise- the wisdom of yoga. Wild- the creative expression in dance. Free- expanding our capacity to enjoy being in our bodies through more sensual and feminine flowing movement. In Qoya, there is no way you can do it wrong and the way you know you're doing it right is that it feels good in your body. More than feeling good, is that it feels honest."

2544.desc:
Long Description:

The Lifestyle Perfected Passion Experience: Living the Life You Love

In this fun and enlivening workshop, you will learn a new context for passion and how to consistently live in a passionate state. Imagine living your life where you are spending the majority of your time doing what you love? Feeling alive and excited about waking up in the morning to experience the day. What would that be like for you? 

Through this workshop you will create a step by step process to:
Understand a new context for passion
Get a clear picture of your passions and what you love to do
Create the steps and room in your life to do things you are passionate about
Share your passions with others to build a community of likeminded people
See an increase in happiness and living a life you love
2544.title: Passion Experience - Nadav Wilf
2544.print_description: Passion is not something we have, it's who we are. Learn how to balance your life and spend the majority of your time living in your passions.

2554.desc: In order to live in a world without war we must first heal the war between the sexes. It is time for feminine power and leadership to rise and join a healthy, incorruptible masculine. Where are the positive archetypes of feminine power? Kali, who cuts off your head? Hera, who is the god form of holly homemaker: basically “Zeus’ wife” with a goddess-sized jealous streak? Wonder Woman, who battles evil but has no family and no love in her life? It’s time for us to tell a new story of femininity, with our choices, with our self-expression, and with our lives. There are too few positive examples of women who are in full command of their sexuality and its attractive powers. There are too few healthy stories of women who’s full creative expression is unbridled and uncontrolled. There are too few healthy stories of men who are powerful without creating harm and violence .  There are too few healthy stories of men who create win-win instead of win-lose.  Learn how to harness the feminine forms and masculine forms of power in each of your interactions and become a true manifestor - brining your highest vision into reality through your being, your words, and your actions.You will learn an unforgettable map of your own sources of power, some of which have been lying dormant for your entire life. Once you can locate and allow all four faces of incorruptible power to move through you, you can lead, inspire, and serve almost anyone. For Men and Women who want to bring their full spiritual presence into the material world and be the bridge between our present reality and the future vision only you can see.
2554.title: Leadership: The Four Faces of Incorruptible Power
2554.print_description: Learn how to harness the feminine forms and masculine forms of power in each of your interactions and become a true integrated leader, & serve anyone

2560.desc:
Do you want to experience poetry of the body while hardly moving at all? 
 Contraexpression is not passivity or the anti-expression; it’s 'contrary-expression' of any expressive stimulus, and it’s irresistible. There is no wrong way to do this.
 
 Open the door to your body to express the unimaginable. 
 
 In the experience, you will be guided through a passage in which you find your own way of moving the body. I don’t ask anyone to move their body in a rhythm, nor engage bodies, nor expect that all the people do the same action. People don’t need to follow a pattern or imitate; it’s experiential, there is no wrong way to do this. I give directions based on trust in the body, and what it can manifest. The person will discover how to adapt these directions to their understanding and needs. Maybe someone can move rapidly, maybe another can move slowly, or hardly at all — each one with their own development and course of action.
 
 This workshop focuses on the method of “The Unknown Theater” (El Teatro Desconocido) directed by Juan Carlos De Petre and developed over forty years by a group of people concentrated on exploration of subtle expression. The practice reveals knowledge; we start from the consciousness of not-knowing — ignorance is the beginning. This knowledge is experimental and creative; not intellectual, preconceived, acquired through repetition, or memory. Participants will work as a unique being, independent, and according to their own development. You can overcome intimidation and shame; discover empowerment, physical malleability, and grace.
2560.title: Contraexpression
2560.print_description: Do you want to experience poetry of the body while hardly moving at all? There is no wrong way to do this.

2569.title: Transcending Fear Workshop
2569.print_description: An existential exploration of fear & EGO. Explore ways to transcend fear, resentment, anger, and guilt by fear mapping & changing habitual beliefs.
2569.desc:
An existential exploration of Fear and EGO. Come learn how fear and our essential state of being work in a dynamic relationship to create our EGO (impulsive actions, and self-defeating beliefs and habits). In this workshop, we will touch on the basic understanding of fear and it's differentiation from Worry, Anxiety, and False Fear. Then dive deep into existentialism explaining why fear has such a programmable hold on our free will, and biology, causing our impulsive actions and thoughts. Then we will explore techniques I've used to transcend my own fears, self-defeating beliefs and habits, freeing myself from years of insecurity, blame, resentment, childhood abuse, guilt from molestation, and general self-hate. I will share every method that has worked for me, and then afterword we will have a Q&A, and have a fun conversation and share our experiences. 

About Me: Hello my name is Nine Johnson, I'm a Performance Anxiety coach in Los Angeles California. I usually work with Actors, Singers, Athletes, Directors and businesses people from all industries to identify and overcome their performance anxieties, insuring confidence and peak performance. I come from a spiritual and self development background with over 15 years experience, in counseling, and life coaching.

2578.desc: In this talk, I will unravel the idea that there has to be pain in Childbirth. I will talk about where pain in childbirth originated and how through our own awareness and education we can also have a birth with little to no pain. I will talk about the history of HypnoBirthing and how in its 25 year history it is now in over 40 countries astonishing and empowering woman everywhere to take back their power in motherhood. I will explain briefly the tools and the processes used from the breath work, meditation, self-hypnosis, and affirmations to achieve an easy, often pain free birth. I will also share the numerous benefits of this simple but super effective course! After all Birthing can be one of the greatest marathons of your life and you want to be prepared with some training, to feel proud of your results knowing you put in the work and did everything you could.
2578.title: Hypno Birthing - Charmaine Hamp
2578.print_description: In this talk, I will unravel the idea that there has to be pain in Childbirth.

2Man guides you to clear dark forces that haunt your body, mind, and spirit. Heal yourself to heal the world.
 
Body, mind, and spirit are all flip sides of the same three-sided coin (spirit counts as a side). We store psychological and spiritual traumas in our bodies and many of us are unsure how to unwind knots that exist on multiple levels. Experienced shamanic practitioner and bodyworker 2Man will guide a group session that guides us through the initial stages of practicing shamanic bodywork. Learn how to get centered in Spirit before starting a session, how to recognize the energetic and physical traumas your subject is carrying, and body/energy/spirit work for destroying the demons that haunt your body, mind, and spirit.  with 2man-Matt King

2611.title: The Arts of Buon Fresco Revealed
2611.print_description: Let’s get PLASTERED! Apprentices will learn Art of Fresco. Upon completion of a fresco block, they’ll be CERTIFIED Plastered Master of the Playa!
2611.desc:
Hi everyone, come and get PLASTERED! ;o)

We humbly invite you all to “Becoming the Master/Mistress of Stones: The Arts of Buon Fresco!”

Welcome to the Burning Man Guild Workshops! For the first time ever, Burning Man is hosting a series of workshops in a Florentine piazza-style format to have Masters of various craftsmanship skills teach our students the arts of the Renaissance. 

We, The Three Faced (Stone) Wench Workshop/Guild, are offering a series of classes you would love to attend! 

Here’s the scoop:

Apprentices will learn the various actual old time techniques over several days to create a fresco (block) from scratch to take home. As part of our commitment to up-cycle, we will utilize and recycle actual (old foam insulation) building materials. Participants will learn to recreate various historical stone mixtures that compromise the the surfaces of the block, complete with plastering, cartooning, and finally the stages of painting the actual fresco with pigments. This artifact creation will be followed by (and applied) techniques to 'age' their artwork with the patina and craquelure of passing time. The result? A beautiful, yet portable and tangible, aged piece of buon fresco that becomes their momento of inspired learning at Burning Man. ;)

Upon completing your fresco block, you will receive a Playa Plastered Master of Arts certificate, authorizing you to be plastered anywhere on the playa!

That’s not all! 

We are offering a unique community project/event, and we invite everyone to participate with your hearts (and energy): 

We are accomplishing a recreation of Gustav Klimt’s Beethoven Frieze (Ode To Joy), with a slight twist on the theme: “All You Need Is Love.” The secco fresco artwork will stretch across several large panels, a moving tribute of the people lost at Orlando, Florida, and of our experiences at Burning Man. 

Please join us! ;o)

Youth ages 12 and up welcome.

2612.desc: Emotional Freedom Technique is a simple processing tool that draws from ancient Chinese medicine, neuroscience, and positive psychology.  We will be percussively tapping on key meridians in our bodies’ natural electrical system and healing real and imagined stories about body and sex shame for ourselves and for the global collective.

2617.title: Embodied Intimacy
2617.print_description: Embodied Intimacy is relational breathing meditation cultivating connection by relating with what is here, right now.
2617.desc:
"Embodied Intimacy is relational breathing meditation done in full body embrace, cultivating connection by relating with what is here, right now. Utilizing the core tools of Tantra: Breath, Sound, Movement and Touch we are slowing down, and we are being together just as we are. As we slow down and link up breath and sound we create all these exquisite feedback loops- body to body, belly to belly, heart to heart, and we invite each other into more and more presence, trust and relaxation.

Embodied Intimacy guides everyone gently from a state of separation and isolation towards safety and oxytocin fueled connection. The result is a simple felt presence, real time intimacy and heartfelt shared truth. The story and drama of the mind subsides and a new level of being is found in its place. In-To-Me-I-See. Sound by Sound, sigh by sigh, breath by breath it all unfolds, melts and unwinds. At the speed of love we learn how to live from the wisdom of our heart instead of the worry of our minds.
"

2619.title: Life Coaching Workshop
2619.print_description: Begin to redefine a new and powerful context from which to run your personal and professional life, where you have a say over the weather.
2619.desc:
Did you ever notice that you and Al Roker (the weatherman) sound a lot alike?  For example, he says, “tomorrow it’s going to rain; for the next five days it’ll be hot & muggy”.  And, you say things like, “today sucked and I’m a procrastinator”, or “I’m not a morning person”, you know, “I’m cloudy with a chance of a storm”…as if you have nothing to do with it, it’s just how you and it is…

But doesn’t weather reporting yourself into “not a morning person,” just gives you a doctor’s note from being nice until noon?

We are all sneakily weather reporters in our lives, pretending we have no say over how we are going to be or how things are going to go.  But what if it’s not so?

Uh oh is right. What if you are actually the author of your life?  

I mean, who else is?  In this workshop, you’ll begin to redefine a new and powerful context from which to run your personal and professional life, where you have a say over the weather.

2620.desc: Many of us have gone through a break up or multiple and some of those break ups are very entangled within your community of lovers. How do we detangle gracefully? How do we respect our other partners, lovers, wants and desires as we make transitions in our lives that hopefully result in healthy habits and no resentment! Many examples to share and lots of space for exploring ideas, sharing and hearing new ones! Come low key, decompress some thoughts, in an open safe space where we're here to listen. May result in a cuddle puddle.

2645.title: Playa Name Ceremony - Anoint Thy Name
2645.print_description: Just as burning of the Man is ritual, we honor your playa name accordingly. Take the rite of passage to legitimize the name by which Burners know you.
2645.desc:
Humans are creatures of ritual. The Burning of the Man is a ritual. The lighting of the lamps is a ritual. Building and visiting the temple is a ritual for many. Playa names are a ritual. What's been missing is a ritual that recognizes and honors playa names. 

Have a playa name? Embrace the rite of passage. It is never too late. 

Don't have a playa name? Find any veteran of ten burns and request to spend time with them so they may divine a name that suits you. Or stop by Zerodrome days before this event for assistance from one of our sages.

Standing among peers, be acknowledged and born again as a child of the Burn. The Grand Zero of Black Rock leads the ceremony, summoning and channeling the eternal energies that bind atoms throughout the universe. Swell with the pride of legitimacy through this rite of passage.

Look for the Road Cone near the Identity Reorganization Portal

2668.desc:
The trans phenomenon. What do you know? What do you wish you knew? What would you like to know, but were afraid to ask. This purpose of this workshop is to educate and enlighten those interested in knowing more about this 3% of the public that few understand. This workshop seeks to help transphobic people... Not in a judgmental way... This is meant in a good way. The very basic definition transphobia, is simply being frightened of trans-folks because of misunderstandings or lack of education on all things trans. This is often because the questions you’ve always wanted to ask, are taboo; making it difficult to learn, understand, and honor the transgender path.

Trans 101: The Nuts and Bolts.
A brief PowerPoint discussion of definitions and the basics of gender, gender identity, gender expression, and sexual orientation. How are transgender and cisgender people alike? How are they different?

Trans 201: A Peak Through the Veil.
After learning the basics, we’ll have a Q&A session where any and all questions will be fielded. We all know that there are questions that are deemed inappropriate to ask a transperson. For this brief moment in time, there are no taboos. We will do our best to answer your questions with honesty, transparency, and sincerity.

Trans 301: Dropping the Veil.
We will bare our souls and our bodies for visual inspection and further Q&A.

Trans 401: Shredding the Veil.
For those brave audience members, we will open ourselves to not only visual review, but hands on, or hands in, examination.
2668.title: Trans 101 thru 401 with Dominique
2668.print_description: The trans phenomenon. Male To Female?  Female To Male?  What you like to know, but were afraid to ask. Get educated and enlightened!

2693.title: Sensual touch and tickling by Domme Sage
2693.print_description: Domme Sage will lead a class on how sensual touch and tickling works together to create a fun & erotic experience. Bring a towel/blanket & a partner.
2693.desc: Touch is a vital part of whom we are, how we interact with the world, and most importantly how you connect with a partner or loved one. Many of us have engaged in sensual touch with a lover or tickling at a young age, but are you aware of how well the two can work together to make an amazing sensory experience with someone? Whether it is tickling to tears, to moans of delight, or simply squirming Kelli Lynn Sage (Domme Sage) is well versed in this and will be leading this class in sensual touch and the art of tickling with a partner. Domme Sage has learned the ropes over the years and wants to pass her wisdom on to you. She will instruct you, with the help of her assistants and volunteers, on the art of tickling and sensual touch. This event is for those 18 years old and over (please bring your ID if you look young). We may be requesting volunteers from the audience for some aspects of the class, so if you are eager to be part of this hands on experience let us know. People of all gender identities are welcome to attend. It is best if you can come with a partner so you can practice some of what you learn, if you come alone we cannot guarantee to partner you up with someone. We recommend bringing a towel or something similar to lay on the ground to sit on. In addition we ask that you be respectful of all participants and remind you to ask before touching someone that you have not made arrangements before hand.

Our Signature drinks are Vodka Lemonade (no promises on ice)  White trash Mimosas, Tang Bang, and we serve ice cold draft beer, we hardly stop there... Our Bartenders are on Vacay too so they can be nice or they can be snarky! Sometimes drinks are gifted, sometimes they are bartered; but never sold!!! 2700.desc: Free yourself from all the aches and pains of the week, restore your body's inner symmetry and alignment, and restore yourself for the weekend! The Feldenkrais Method emphasizes the connection between the mind, body, and spirit. It helps with blood flow, the realignment of our bones, muscles and joints, and with the coordination of our overall movement patterns. Be prepared to lay down, relax and attune to yourself as Shara guide’s you through gentle, simple movement sequences guaranteed to shift your nervous system to a place of greater serenity, comfort, and joy. Please bring a mat or blanket if you have one.

2702.desc: Did you know that the more oxygenated your food is, the better you taste it? That's why ice cream tastes better with a fork than with a spoon. And that's why our natural inclination is to eat with our mouths open. What's the big deal about what it looks like? You're willing to put it in your mouth and chew but you're not willing to look at it? That's like a carnivore who's unwilling to kill their own cow. So, go ahead and taste what you've been missing—today you can eat with your mouth OPEN!
2702.title: Socially Appropriate Eat-With-Your-Mouth-Open Day
2702.print_description: Did you know that the more oxygenated your food is, the better you taste it? That's why ice cream tastes better with a fork than with a spoon.

2703.title: Eye See Astrology & Tea
2703.print_description: Take a breather while we pamper you! Amazing eye enhancement, astrology reading, and organic herbal tea. We look forward to making you feel loved!
2703.desc:
Come visit Eyes of the Soul and allow former professional make-up artist, Julie Klass, work on enhancing one of the most amazing elements the universe has ever created  ……… YOUR EYES. 
Often called the windows to your soul, we believe your eyes hold special meaning and represent so much of your inner beauty. We hope to enhance your unique eyes, and allow your inner beauty to shine through!
While Julie works on your eyes, we will complete an Astrology reading based on both your main Astrological sign and your Rising sign. We hope this will help you reflect a little more on who you are, and open yourself up to everything the universe has in store for you at Burning Man.
In addition to the make-up and Astrology readings, we will immerse you with a calming and reflective environment using natural wind chimes and aroma therapy. Based on some simple questions, we will try to assess your personal mood, tastes and physical needs. We will suggest some remedies using over (30) of the finest grade natural oils. We will suggest a combination of remedies that may include taste, touch and smell to help you rejuvenate.

You will also be served a relaxing organic herbal tea.

Eyes of the Soul wants you to feel even better than felt when you arrived. We are happy to send you out to the playa refreshed, rejuvenated, and better equipped to deal with the elements

2720.desc:
Adam Eidinger spills the beans on organizing creative direct action as an art form. A leader in the camp Refoamation, Adam's philosophy of Phrygianism combines citizen action, psychedelics and civil defense.  In 2014 Adam legalized marijuana in Washington, DC and will talk strategy.  He'll also speak about the Liberty Cap and its role for thousands of years connecting liberation struggles since Roman times as well the to cap's connection to psychedelic spirituality in the Mithra tradition

Adam has been arrested 18 times fighting for justice in the Belly of the Beast, Washington, DC.  He is the social action director for Dr. Bronner's Magic Soaps and is the foam OG who first set up the magic foam at Burning Man with Kris Bronner in 2009.  Since then he's helped lead the Dr. Bronner' camp (called Refoamation in 2016) as it has expanded its perfoaming activities.  Adam has been making creative plans for major protests since 2000.  His talk will reveal practical tips and advice for anyone activist or non-activist.  Adams lives by the creed of Ralph Nader who once said, "If you don't turn onto politics, politics will turn on you."
2720.title: Phrygianism and the Refoamation
2720.print_description: Creative direct action as an art form. Adam Eidinger speaks about Phrygianism which combines citizen action and psychedelics.

2744.desc: Ibrahim AlHusseini is an award winning entrepreneur, impact investor and philanthropist known for founding FullCycle Energy Fund. FullCycle is dedicated to revolutionizing our relationship with waste by turning our costly global garbage crisis into clean fuel that can power communities worldwide. In this compelling talk Ibrahim will share his personal journey that began as a young immigrant from the Middle East and led to him becoming a successful entrepreneur and an award winning impact investor. He will share how his experiences shaped his career and life and how it’s the choices we make today that will ultimately determine the quality of life of future generations.  His accomplishments and devotion to making a difference are inspiring but it’s his passion for sharing the power of giving back with others that makes him a sought after speaker worldwide.  The audience will leave knowing the power we have to make a difference and how to create the future we all want.
2744.title: Investing In The Future We Want
2744.print_description: Ibrahim will share his dedication to solving our greatest social and environmental problems through impact investing.

2761.title: Balancing the Masculine and Feminine with Shara
2761.print_description: In this deeply reflective class, we will be looking at blocks in how we run our male/female energy channels, and then balance ourselves.
2761.desc:
In this interactive and deeply reflective class, we will be looking at blocks in how we run our male/female energy channels, and then do a process of healing and balancing these parts of ourselves.

For you sensitive ones who have been experiencing intense energy and transition, know that the portal is now open for amazing, exponential growth and karma clearing! Now is the PERFECT time to integrate the endings, awakenings, transformations, death and rebirth experiences related to the self and others and to welcome a more balanced exchange between the masculine and feminine as well as man and woman.

Imbalances in females sometimes shows up as feminine infections, shame, control and dis-empowerment issues, suppression of desire, and feelings of inadequacy.  In males it may present as an unfulfillment of sexuality cravings and desires or difficulty connecting fully with the opposite sex.

This class will be a combination of lecture, group shares, and interactive exercises.

2775.print_description:
Through gentle, subtle movement sequences, the method helps us restore our inner alignment, balance, and symmetry.

Please bring a yoga mat
2775.desc:
Ready to free yourself from all those playa aches and pains? 

Feldenkrais is a gentle, subtle and effective approach to healing. It helps with blood flow, the realignment of our bones, muscles and joints and with the coordination of our overall movement patterns. 

Be prepared to lay down, relax and attune to yourself as Shara guide’s you through gentle simple movement sequences guaranteed to shift your nervous system to a place of more serenity, comfort, and joy. Please bring a mat or blanket if you have one. 

The perfect way to rejuvenate your tired playa body

2776.desc: Feeling guilty about that late night poutine binge? Addicted to the sweat? We're all about beatings, and this one you apply to your own-self. Nice padded mats, shady enclosure, pumping eighties music, none of this will lesson your suffering. Mistress Va Jay Jay is here to help you hurt yourself.

We will be spinning your favorite songs from The Cure and The Smiths in an indoor night club with a real wooden dance floor. 2786.desc: Experiencing the capacity to build institutions that incorporate our values can be profoundly liberating.  But this can also be all-consuming.  Is there something inherent in building institutions that is inconsistent with joy and freedom?  This talk is a group conversation that examines the journey of successfully creation of institutions that embody our values and whether so doing can help us to actualize "a more beautiful world our hearts know is possible, or whether there are pitfalls inherent to institution-bulding that should be avoided altogether by the light-hearted amongst us.
2786.title: Building Ethical Institutions:  Is it Worth a Try?
2786.print_description: Is there something inherent in building institutions that is inconsistent with joy and freedom?

2806.desc: The sun is rising. Your starting to sweat.. your weapon is getting heavy.. you look across the battle field at an alarming amount  of enemys screaming "F*ck your Burn!!". you look at your commander and he seems calm and it calms you. He looks back at his troops. he makes eye contact with you... His mouth turns to a giant smile. you get a chill up your spine. your eyes widen and you feel a serge of adrenaline as you hear your commanders battle cry of "CHARGE". your battalion starts at a full sprint towards the enemy scurge. after the dust clears and the battle is done your remaining battalion and commander sit down for a morning meal in Valhalla...
2806.title: Battle Of Breakfast
2806.print_description: Dawn your arms and prepare for wave after wave of heritics screaming "fuck your burn!" Then after, enjoy your feast in valhalla with breakfast!!!!!!!!

2807.title: Polymer Clay Workshop with Polimerica sulla Playa
2807.print_description: Join us to learn how to make your own art or jewelry out of polymer clay. Teachers & premade projects will guide you into making your own special art
2807.desc:
Come join Polimerica sulla Playa under The Man and create your own polymer clay jewelry, art, or keepsake to commemorate this year's burn. We'll have step by step images of a number of techniques, as well as experienced teachers there to help you. You can make something as complicated or as simple as you like. 

While you wait (or stroll the piazza), we'll bake your piece and then return it to you, ready to be displayed, cherished and remembered.

2808.desc: Ho, ho ho… merry Burnmas everyone! Some of you have been naughty, and some of you have been nice, and some have been nice and naughty. Come and sit on Santa’s Lap and tell him that you have been good or bad this year and ask what you want for Burnmas. This event is for adults who can have a little naughty conversation with Santa and ask for something delightful this year. Participants will receive a small gift from Santa (naughty or nice) while supplies last. This event is for adults ages 18 and over so that you don’t have to feel a need to filter yourself around younger burners.
2808.title: Meet and Greet with Santa for Adults
2808.print_description: Santa knows if you have been naughty or nice, and now is your time to visit Santa and tell him what you want for Burnmas! There may be gifts waiting..

2810.desc: Meet us on the East Side of the Temple for a Radically Inclusive NA Meeting. This meeting is coordinated with addicts all over the default world and beyond so that we all offer the energy of the Serenity Prayer into the universe together! Anyone with a desire to quit using is welcome. Look for our symbol!
2810.title: Narcotics Anonymous Unity Meeting
2810.print_description: Join us for an annual group Serenity Prayer and NA meeting coordinated in real time with addicts everywhere! East of Temple--Look for our symbol!

2811.print_description: Make your own anointing oil and salt scrubs. Tea, meditation, and creation. Bee's Knees!
2811.desc: Join us in celebrating the energy of the burn by putting it in a physical form to take home with you! We will create anointing oil (intention-infused oil) and a salt scrub: mix together or enjoy separately. Guided meditation and tea also provided.

2816.desc: Join A Confederacy of Dunces in Snowflake Village mid-day for a snack to help celebrate Meat Log Monday from our New Orleans-inspired Hot Dog Cart!  Come help us devour our 12 inches of Paradise, you lucky dog, you!  Beef & Vegetarian options available!  Condiments provided.  Before you leave, make sure to wash down our meaty mouthful with an icy adult beverage from our Night of Joy Bar!  Pirates & Quarterites Welcome, Communiss Not Allowed.

Or come with your bad ideas to cheer on and/or laugh at our contenders!

2819.desc: Please bring your uneaten and unopened food in support of our food drive for the Pyramid Lake Paiute Tribe.  Food will be collected and boxed in our commissary all day.  There are also designated drop-off locations for the collected food en route to Reno, so please take a box or two with you if you can.  If you have any questions, ask for Fabien at Comfort & Joy.  Thanks!

A discussion about the serious possibility of extraterrestial life.

We'll learn to sense and feel the energy that moves through our bodies with Qi Gong practice then we'll explore Viewpoints Space Awareness and Open Improvisation. Before the end of our time together we'll venture into the realm of Meditation in Action and Contemplative Dance. (2 hr class)

Sumo wrestling M-F 7-10pm

No Adults allowed at our bar! Open Monday through Saturday, noon until midnight. Lots of fun & drinks for those who can't adult. (21+)

Join us for Sumo Wrestling too, Monday through Friday, 7-10pm

2830.desc:
Whether you want to take on your career, your love life, your health, your body and/or your family (yes, even yours!) this year, this workshop will teach you how to dream in every area of your life that matters to you, it will show you what’s in the way of your dreams and get you into the right actions to, once and forever, realize every last one of those dreams.

We will guide you through this profound discovery and give you the practical tools you need to set your life on a different trajectory.  You will leave with a new perspective, attainable goals and an inspired, goosebump-worthy personal plan.
2830.title: Life Coaching Workshop
2830.print_description: Learn how to dream in every area of your life, figure out what’s in the way and get into the right actions to realize every last one of those dreams!

2831.title: Prince & Bowie Tribute
2831.print_description: We drown you in Purple Rain cocktails and deliver a Space Oddity of imagery in honor of two genius musicians that we said goodbye to this year.
2831.desc:
Join us at the Ali-Bar-Bar Tent as we drown you in Purple Rain cocktails and deliver a Space Oddity of imagery in honor of two genius musicians that we said goodbye to this year.

Ali-Bar-Bar brings tribute to Prince & David Bowie and promises a dance party you won't forget, featuring the legendary sounds of these two brilliant artists, complete with tantalizing, purple libations. 

Bring on the gold spandex and lip loss, and stir up a little Ziggy Stardust on The Playa as we pay tribute to Pop Culture's revered Prince and Modern Rock's icon, David Bowie.

2836.desc:
Solar Burners! You’re invited to a clean energy summit at Burning Man 2016!

Please join Black Rock Solar on Tuesday, August 30, 2016 for the on-playa happy hour for burners working in, wanting to work in, or just friends of, the solar industry: SOLAR PLAYA INTERNATIONAL (SPI). We will be serving cool libations. Chat about the future of solar and how to revolutionize the world’s energy supply while sipping a cool beverage.

What: SPI - Black Rock Solar's 7th annual playa happy hour event
Where: Everywhere Pavilion / ARTery, on the Esplanade at 6:15
When: Tuesday, August 30, 4-6pm
Who: All are welcome!

Featuring:
- Hobnobbin' with burners working in renewable energy, climate change, art,
sustainability and environmental policy
- Cool libations & playa munchies
- Black Rock Solar crew, staff and board members
2836.title: Solar Playa International Happy Hour
2836.print_description: Black Rock Solar hosts a gathering to chat about the future of solar and how to revolutionize the world’s energy supply while sipping a cool beverage.

2837.print_description: CUS EMAK!  HEKOKI! SOOKIN SYN! Want to know what these mean? Our camp is filled with native speakers waiting to spew some dirty demonic words at you
2837.desc: CUS EMAK!  HEKOKI! SOOKIN SYN! Want to know what these mean? Dare to practice them? Have some unique curses you can teach us? It’s a well-known fact that one curse is worth 10000 words! So come learn a few! Our international camp is filled with native speakers of many languages waiting to spew some dirty demonic words at you.

2838.desc: Uncover where money dysmorphia has you compromising yourself and how you use your non-renewable resources of time, energy and attention so you can reclaim what really matters and put your money and other resources to work for you and the life you want.
2838.title: Enough! The Money Wake Up Call to Reclaim Yourself
2838.print_description: Money dysmorphia: the distorted view of money that compromises how you use your non-renewable resources of time, energy and attention. Cure it here.

2889.title: Laughter Yoga
2889.print_description: Laughter as exercise! Laugh with others in childlike playfulness; experience the health benefits of good, long, & pleasurable laughs with us! Healthy!
2889.desc: Start your evenings with the most intense laughter you can experience. We laugh for no reason, other than for exercise, and health. Relieve stress and pain, promote natural healing, and create spontaneous bonds of friendship through group laughter. It’s fun! The brainchild of Dr. Madan Kataria in India and practiced by millions worldwide, Laughter Yoga combines Unconditional Laughter with Yogic Breathing (Pranayama). Anyone can Laugh for No Reason, without relying on humor, jokes or comedy. Laughter is simulated as a body exercise in a group; with eye contact and childlike playfulness, it soon turns into real and contagious laughter. “Inappropriate” Laughter Yoga is also a possibility, if our clientele are okay with it. The concept of Laughter Yoga is based on a scientific fact that the body cannot differentiate between fake and real laughter. One gets the same physiological and psychological benefits. Find much more info online by searching on Laughter Yoga, but come! Enjoy!

2890.desc: Are human naturally monogamous or promiscuous?  Neither view makes sense given what we've learned about human sexual psychology in the last couple of decades. Most of us seem to have evolved over the last million years to be polyamorous by nature. But we are socialized into monogamist mating norms that amplify sexual jealousy, reduce compersion, stifle our sexual sovereignty, and limit the social networks that we instinctively try to build through lovers and metamours. In this talk, a leading evolutionary psychology professor (author of 'The Mating Mind', 'Spent', and 'Mate') will give a quick, fun overview of the new science behind poly. Then we'll have a Q&A.
2890.title: The Evolutionary Psychology of Polyamory
2890.print_description: A fun intro to the new science showing that most humans evolved to be naturally polyamorous rather than monogamous or promiscuous.

2919.print_description: Come to DragonCamp Armory to make your own Sexy Aluminum Armor Bikini to keep, wear and share on the Playa! We will teach you how! Mornings daily.
2919.desc:
Come to DragonCamp Armory to make your own Sexy Armor Bikini to wear and share on the Playa! We will teach you simple traditional hand working metal skills to cut, shape, and hammer aluminum into a sexy bikini bra and/or bottom. Decorate with bits of jewelry to personalize yours. Tie with leather thong for a secure fit.  
These are the same metal shaping skills that craftspersons used in Da Vinci’s time to create beautiful works of art. Wear and share yours here at Burning Man! Allow about 2 hours for completion. Come early- limited supplies. Feel free to bring any small or broken baubles, earrings, etc.  to donate or help decorate bikinis with. 

Your partner can come watch, but this is primarily  a workshop  to empower women to learn to use simple hand tools to release their inner creativity. Costumes like this cost $$$ when purchased.  Make it as sexy as you dare. Yours is free to keep, and you'll be proud to wear it! Since each piece is custom formed for you, it will fit perfectly- large or small. And yes, it is cool, light and comfortable- even on the playa.

(As an added bonus, "Sunny" our resident body painter will also be on hand to offer body decoration if anyone who wants to wear even less!)

Catch someone’s eye during this super flirtatious blender bar event. Both alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks will be served. All genders welcome all ways. We mean this - you can be trans, cis, boy, girl, gay, bi, dyke, king, queen, loving these words, hating these words, our neighbors, or from far-away lands across the playa: this night is for you. So let’s enjoy ...each other!

2930.desc:
We live in a shared dream, fractals of the same consciousness appreciating individuation. Within and without, our inner nature reflects into our outer reality. We can choose our vibrational frequency. A divine playmate can help enhance our ability to grow into new spaces in the universe considerably. 
 
 Acknowledging that we are the same self projecting through unique layerings of stories, we can assist one another in rebuilding the body, our temple for spirit. Reaching out into every direction of your universe and expanding consciousness with the breath, we can reactivate the energetic body together. 
 
 We'll be delving into how to realign the spine, our antenna to unity consciousness using acro yoga paired with kundalini energetic healing. The physical body is the intermediary for every dimension of our existence. By arousing kundalini energy the practitioner can activate third eye so that the distortions may be witnessed as they are released.
 
 We are our own best healer. Working together we can amplify the effects of our alchemical growth while releasing post traumatic stress from past lives and feeling trust again.
2930.title: Kundalini Acro Reactivation
2930.print_description: Cosmic dancing together, loving all that is alchemically. Realigning the spine with kundalini activation and acro, rebuilding the temple.

2933.print_description:
Actoroke is “Karaoke for actors.” Act out a movie scene or be on the crew. Cameras, teleprompters, wireless

Wed & Fri 10:00 pm to late
2933.desc:
Actoroke is “Karaoke for actors.” In Karaoke you would pick a song to sing in front of your friends and strangers. In Actoroke, you and a friend pick a scene from a popular movie to act out. We will have a full film crew setup, complete with 3 cameras (wide master, and one on each actor), wireless lapel mics for each actor, 2 teleprompters (one for each actor, in their eye line), and a truss and lighting setup.

You will be directed by our camp’s filmmaker, Hoss Hitchcock, who will help you through your performance. Come get the full experience of acting and being directed.

The video feeds from all three cameras will be displayed in the “video village” where your friends and strangers can watch your performance!

If this sounds fun but you don’t want to act, then try your hand at running a camera or teleprompter!

Wed & Fri 10:00 pm to late

2944.desc:
Are you creating a large ripple in the world? Gather w other men committed to creating global transformation through living their purpose. Your intelligence, your strength & your leadership skills are needed. Now more than ever. 

You will be guided through a process that I have been cultivating for more than seven years to help you gain crystal clarity on the man that you must become to naturally, even easily bring your great vision into reality. 

We will explore different aspects of what Evolved Masculine Leadership looks like, and how to step into it even more powerfully to both bring forth your great vision and become a role model of the Evolved Masculine that the world is calling forth for now more than ever before.

2945.title: Life Coaching Workshop
2945.print_description: Nix your negative traits! What if you got your bad behaviors under new management? Wouldn't you be proud? Would it be worth it? Come learn how.
2945.desc:
We all have negative traits that come out under certain circumstances at work. Whether it’s when we’re stressed, worried, overwhelmed, or, the new age old favorite, when Mercury is in retrograde. Right? Except, no matter what, no matter how warranted it feels in the moment, our bad behaviors never leave us proud of ourselves.

Righteous? Check. Justified? Check. Proud? No.

What would be possible, if by the end of 2016, you had your bad behaviors under new management? Wouldn’t you have a totally different experience at work? Wouldn’t you be more impressed with yourself? Wouldn’t it be worth it? Wouldn’t you be proud?

Check.

Come learn how to nix your negative traits, and get fighting for the right team, your dreams team!

2952.desc:
"He's so fit, I bet he has such high confidence...
 She's so skinny, she must never be lonely...
 Oh I'm too....blah... I'll never be... blah
 CALLING BULLSHIT
 Sexy, ugly, Hung, small, Fit, fat, big nose, weird toes.... ugh! Enough!
 All these descriptions leave their Scars. Want to drop that stone?
 We all have fears of social rejection based on external appearance.
 Some contracted crappy idea that to in order to get love I have to look a certain way, be a certain somebody, or they wont accept me.
 This space is for sharing those deep painful truths
 The big kid in school may get bullied outright, but the pretty kid is also cursed, they can never express their self consciousness, their insecurity, their fears and alone feelings, ""its not allowed""
 Well FUCK THAT
 Here, You Are Allowed. All of You. Welcome your doubts, welcome your pride, welcome welcome welcome to your blessed body."

2971.desc: Reverbia is proud to bring you a very special presentation of Pink Floyd's Dark Side of the Moon (full album) Live Music Concert!!  Under the Desert Night Stars, amidst the cosmic clouds of psychedelic humanity…the perfect blissful and vibrational setting for Floyd.  21 year old Rock/Indie Virtuoso Alexa Melo, honors this timeless legendary piece with her lead vocals and lead guitar…backed by a star studded cast of exceptional musical talent, including Michael Mowgli from The Mowglis on Rhythm Guitar, Christian Hand on drums...Tempe, AZ music icon Brett Hinders on keyboards, and Vir McCoy of Dogon Lights on Bass…along with other very special guests.  With the Interactive giant art globe The ORB (featured at the World's Fair in Paris) above the stage…in full light improvisational movement…this is a must see show…all cosmic Black Rock City Citizens will want to experience.

2975.print_description: Align the energy of all seven chakras with Lady Casa during this fun & interactive appreciation of cat energy - connecting our mind, body, & souls.
2975.desc: Mediation lead by Lady Casa will visualize, balance, and align the energy for all seven chakras including the root, sacral, solar plexus, heart, throat, third eye, and crown. Each chakra will be referred to as if we were cats! For example when referencing the root chakra, she will guide the camp kitties to root their energy like a cat would stretching and/or climbing a tree. This will be a fun, interactive, and great exercise for the appreciation of cat energy and connecting with our mind, body, and souls. Me-Oum and Namaste

2983.title: "Speed Art Build" by Jimmy Descant, ADA's Guild
2983.print_description: Speed Art Build by Jimmy Descant, of the "Amalgamated Debris Assemblage Guild" of Salida, CO. will "Speed Build" art with 10 participants Thurs nt 7-9
2983.desc:
Jimmy Descant, head artist of the "Amalgamated Debris Assemblage Guild" of Salida, CO. will conduct a special event on Thursday night, 7-9pm, called "The Speed Build" of found object assemblage art. Jimmy and the Guild are masters of turning parts from the Golden Age of American manufacturing into beautiful assemblages.
Audience artist participants thru the week who experience the ADA's booth can put in their name for a lottery to be drawn at 6:30 on Thursdays evening, to be one on 10 chosen artists for this special event. The 10 artists will get a blank board to work on, will choose their own subject matter for the art, and show it to Jimmy at the start of the build. Imagine speed chess!!! where Jimmy will take their suggestion, lay out a few pieces to start and instruct the artist to apply what he did, and as Jimmy works around to the other artists, they add their own vision until Jimmy comes back around, to compound the vision! All other Guild members will help with instruction, tools, and raw materials in this frantic 2 hour filmed creation of 10 unique works of art, finishing with flair and fire into the darkness! As with all created art during the week, the artists rule what happens when done... keep, showcase, give away, burn, gift it...
2983.other_location: "Amalgamated Debris Assemblage" , DaVinci Guilds at the Man

2986.desc: Pancakes on the playa! Pile yours high with heavenly berries and orbit the Star Bar for Bloody Marys. Art, acting, and poetry while you wait. Our piping-hot cakes come crammed with chocolate chips, cranberries, blueberries, or all of the above, and can be finished with a huge selection of toppings (fresh fruit at the beginning of the week, as well as options including peanut butter, jam, nutella, maple syrup, honey etc). Meanwhile, our camp watering hole, the Star Bar, will serve copious quantities of Bloody Marys, Screwdrivers, and Pina Coladas. Our campers showcase their creative passions while you wait: "adult" coloring books, improv acting sessions, and free-form poetry. Express yourself!

2987.title: Playa Glass: melt dust into black glass jewlery
2987.print_description: Use our welding goggles and Fresnel lenses to melt playa dust into black glass!  Take your creation back home mounted to a metal pendant.
2987.desc: What exactly is playa dust? A bunch of metal oxides that, when raised several thousand degrees Fahrenheit, make some amazing black glass. Come and use our welding goggles and Fresnel lenses to melt the playa. We have a jewelry making station where you can mount your glass on a pendant for safe transport back to the default world.

2988.desc:
We will have 10 pre-stretched and heavy duty canvases that are 3'x4' tiled together to create a 30' x4' artists playground. We will supply all water based acrylic paints in an array of colors. We will supply all brushes and artist knives. We will have palate mixing available as well as ample water and rags to assist you in color changes. We will maintain the entegraty of this project and make sure there is everything you need to get lost in your own world of art expression. We will have satellite radio for your listening pleasure and will keep the wall lit for several hours at night too! And the end of the event we will disassemble the wall and randomly distribute the finished canvases. These rare gifts will each hold the work of hundreds of passing artists who will have combined to create the memory of BRC 2016!!!
AND...while you are there and if you dare, Thomas delFuego will let you choose a Rune from his pile of hand painted Runes. These stones on 10,000 year old sand concretions and will speak to your heart and that very moment:):):) Come join Thomas and Darma delFuego and become our friends for life!
2988.title: PaintingWallofGreenPeaceEvolves

10 canvas Interactive painting wall with our paints/brushes/30' x4' Canvas wall. Canvases given away at event end.
Rune Readings and music daily

2989.title: CONSCIOUS EROTIC TOUCH
2989.print_description: In this experiential workshop you will learn how to give electrifying erotic touch with delicious, embodied intention.
2989.desc: In this experiential workshop you will learn how to give electrifying erotic touch with delicious, embodied intention. You will be guided through playful exercises that will give you a somatic understanding of what it means to be an active receiver, and an even better giver. Learn how to make your hands an extension of your heart while sending love through circular Tantric breath. Perfect the art of setting loving boundaries as a means to give and receive your heart’s desires. Leave feeling deeply connected, vibrantly alive, and (hopefully) a little bit turned-on!

Missing from the printed manual so write us down and tell your friends!

You know those 2-inch, round lapel pins often used for political candidates and such? Ever wanted to make one with your own design? Well we’d love to help you realize that dream!

Button UP! camp has events on Tues and Thurs from 2-4pm, when you can come draw your own design or bring a small image you’ve printed (must be paper), and stamp it onto a pin.

We love having people come by, grab a drink, make a pin and stay for a chat so please put us on your calendar and come for a visit!
